I think the whole town will be delighted to know that the next time there's trouble, Mistria will be ready!
Keep an eye on that stove, Dad!
eng.Cutscenes/Story Events/Town Repair/upgra: But just thinking about expanding the workshop... all that extra space and new tools...
My hands get itchy just thinking about all the projects I could take on!
I know, I know, I'm retired.
Here, for the $Donation Box$. Don't tell Ryis, okay?
Ryis won't stop talking about all the exciting new projects he could do if his shop gets that expansion.
I'm excited about the shop expansion, but take your time okay, [Ari]?
Hoho, I can see you've brought [Ari]! Your proposal must have really caught Adeline's attention, Ryis!
I thought that'd catch your interest! Tell you what, when we're done, I'll throw in a $Small Greenhouse Blueprint$ for free.
And we can cover all of the ordinary materials, since we have some in stock.
Thank you, Ryis!
Now, I'm delighted to report that Mistria's recent turnaround has meant the town's coffers are finally in the black!
A larger, more advanced Carpenter's Shop benefits the whole town, so we're happy to cover the tesserae costs.
[Ari], if you could handle gathering $100 Pedra Refinada$, $100 Glass$, $30 Crystal$, and $30 Obsidian$, we'd have all we need.
You can count on me!
Of course! Lucky we built that Refineria de Pedra, huh?
Yahoo!
Who needs luck when we've got you in town, [Ari]?
Wonderful! I'll put the $Donation Box$ right outside the Carpenter's Shop. Then when you're done come talk to me!
Thank you, [Ari].
Well, really it's [Ari]'s fault.
Mistria's town rank has been shooting up and the projects have been quickly getting more complex.
Those fancy schmancy vendor booths really caught us off guard!
Nothing we couldn't handle of course, but we had to do some improvising.
So I talked it over with my uncle, and we submitted a blueprint for a new addition to the shop to Adeline.
It was very comprehensive! You two certainly made a powerful case.
I'll spare you busy folks all the technical details, but it'll let us take on big new custom orders!
A larger workshop would mean that a $second story upgrade on your house$ would be possible, and we'd be able to start selling $Greenhouse$ blueprints.
So I could start growing crops out of season?
A Greenhouse would look great on my farm...
Hey, [Ari]! We're in the back, come on in!
I love Cuidar del Jardí outdoors, but it's awfully tempting...
I could grow all my favorite flowers out of season!
Did you hear that the Carpenter's Shop is selling Greenhouses now?
So I made you a =Vegetable Pot Pie=! Go on, take it!
I know I've already thanked you, [Ari] but well, you've really gone above and beyond for Ryis and myself...
After all the projects he's been helping us out on, I thought he already had!
With the extra room at the shop now, Uncle Landen has been talking about coming out of retirement again.
Ooh, Ryis and Landen will be so excited! Come on, let's get started!
Nicely done everyone!
Wonderful work, all of you! I haven't seen a finer workshop anywhere in Aldaria.
Here's that $Small Greenhouse Blueprint$, [Ari]. And thank you again, for everything.
And feel free to swing on by if you want to see the rest of the new projects we can offer now!
Whew!
Ryis and I are going to make the best booths they've ever seen!
There you are! Thank you so much for helping out with those goofy requirements for those snooty Capital vendors.
I'm looking forward to working on the new vendor booths.
Never thought I'd see the day where a town project required me to do gold ornamentation work...
It's such a big milestone for the town!
I can't thank you enough for helping out with these market booths, [Ari].
It's a really exciting project! I've roped in March to help with the gold ornamentation, he loves working on that kind of thing.
Landen and I have been working on the new vendor booth's blueprints.
I'll let Ryis know, I'm sure he and Landen are raring to go.
We should be able to get everything ready for the new vendors to join us on $Saturday$!
You've gathered all the materials for the new Saturday Market vendors? Incredible work, [Ari]!
[Ari]! I can't wait to tell you all about the news. Come on!
A letter arrived from the $Aldarian Merchant's Guild$, Nora.
And uh... $Wheedle$. He's apparently very high up in the Merchant's Guild, specializing in $extremely high-end goods$.
You're right, I have heard about them. Supposedly, they're both real characters.
But I shouldn't let rumors stand in the way of letting everyone in Mistria enjoy their booths.
I feel the same way.
Now, the Capital will be covering their traveling expenses...
And before you worry about it Nora, I volunteer the front lawn of the Casa Pairal for them to set up their booths.
But the Merchant's Guild has sent along... er, exacting requirements for the construction of their booths, which Mistria needs to cover.
Let me see...
$Gold Lingots$? For a market booth?!
These numbers are unfortunately after I negotiated them down... they were even worse initially...
That is big news!
There's enough in the Market coffers to take this down by another 20%, but even then it's outrageous.
I suppose the Saturday Market doesn't need to have an upgrade this year... or this decade...
If the Saturday Market needs a helping hand, it's got mine!
If it'll get my old pal Wheedle back in town, count me in!
Oh, [Ari]! Thank you!
I... I didn't know you and Wheedle were such good friends! In any case...
We'll need $8 Gold Lingots$, $20 Obsidian$, $20 Crystal$, $100 Fusta Noble$, and $50 Pedra Refinada$.
You're a lifesaver, [Ari].
I'll set up the $Donation Box$ outside the Casa Pairal.
The $Aldarian Merchant's Guild$ handles all the business in the Capital, as well as any incoming and outgoing shipments in the country.
A little place like Mistria would normally be beneath their notice.
They're impressed with how successful our $Saturday Market$ has become, and with how high our town rank has risen.
In fact, they're so impressed, they're considering adding Mistria to the weekly travel routes of $two of their top vendors$!
That's- That's incredible! Anyone I'd know?
I think you'll recognize both their names.
First up is $Taliferro$, he's the Royal Chef whose $Cooking Challenge$ booth has been a huge hit across Aldaria.
What's this all about, Adeline? I haven't seen you this excited since we got in that special order of colored pens.

eng.items/mines/deep_earth/crystal_berries/d: These berries have a glasslike appearance and are very sweet.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/crystal_rose/desc: This delicate, shimmering rose appears to be made of crystal.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/crystal_wing_moth: A rare Deep Earth insect. Their delicate wings reflect the light and make them sparkle.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/crystal/descripti: A shard of crystal. Used in crafting recipes.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/crystalline_crick: A common Deep Earth insect. The stones around it vibrate in tune with its song.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/deep_earthworm/de: An uncommon Deep Earth insect. It's completely unlike its surface-dwelling cousin... if you're a worm expert.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/earth_eel/descrip: A common medium Deep Earth fish. Doesn't seem to have a mouth, so who knows what it eats.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/earth_infused_sto: An uncommon artifact. This chunk of rock has taken on elemental qualities of earth.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/earthshroom/descr: These mushrooms grow in dense clusters, and smell strongly of earth.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/emerald_horned_ch: A rare large Deep Earth fish. This large fish is nearly all horn, which seems to be made of pure emerald.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/faceted_rock_gem/: A uncommon artifact. Despite its mesmerizing, gem-like appearance, it's just a piece of rock.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/gem_shard_caterpi: An uncommon Deep Earth insect. It seems to feed on crystal berries.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/pebble_minnow/des: A common small Deep Earth fish. The scales of these fish have taken on a pebbled texture to help it blend into its surroundings.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/really_round_rock: A common artifact. This naturally formed stone is unnaturally round.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/rock_roach/descri: An uncommon Deep Earth insect. It's cuter than you'd expect.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/rock_statue/descr: A rare artifact. This naturally formed stone appears to be in the shape of a human, but... surely it's just a coincidence.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/rockbiter/descrip: An uncommon medium Deep Earth fish. This fish has an over-developed jaw to help it grind down stone.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/rockroot/descript: It's hard to tell if this is part of a living plant or if it just resembles one.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/seriously_square_: A common artifact. This naturally formed stone is a perfect square, a true delight for a rock connoisseur.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/shale_grass/descr: This grass only looks like it's made of rock. Very tough to cut.
eng.items/mines/deep_earth/shardfin/descript: An uncommon small Deep Earth fish. This fish's sleek fin has an iridescent shimmer.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/armored_bass/desc: A common medium Coves de Lava fish. This bass species has adapted to grow incredibly thick and metallic looking scales.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/ash_mushroom/desc: A delicate mushroom that releases ashlike spores when jostled.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/breath_of_fire/de: These beautiful flowers continue to glow, even after they've been picked.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/candelabra_seadra: An uncommon small Coves de Lava fish. This seadragon has a number of thin protrusions that make it look like its namesake.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/cooktop_beetle/de: A common Coves de Lava insect. The top of this beetle's shell is hot enough to fry an egg.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/diamond_beetle/de: A rare Coves de Lava insect. This wondrous beetle had an impenetrable defense... unless you pick it up.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/fire_crystal/desc: A common Coves de Lava artifact. This crystal has been imbued by the essence of fire.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/fire_wasp/descrip: A common Coves de Lava insect. Luckily this wasp seems to be a danger only to other insects.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/firesail_fish/des: Un peix gran i rar de Coves de Lava. El pots trobar a lava. Its physiology is a complete mystery.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/flame_pepper/desc: These incredibly hot peppers should be handled with care.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/hot_potato/descri: These pre-cooked wild Patates have a tangy flavor that is surprisingly addictive.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/lava_piranha/desc: A common small Coves de Lava fish. This fish couldn't be more alarming in both its appearance and its behavior.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/lava_snail/descri: An uncommon Coves de Lava insect. This snail leaves tiny molten trails.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/rainbow_geode/des: An uncommon Coves de Lava artifact. This incredible geode is formed of many different gems, all fused together.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/red_obsidian/desc: An uncommon Coves de Lava artifact. This chunk of obsidian has a streak of Vermell running through it.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/smoke_moth/descri: An uncommon Coves de Lava insect. This moth generates a small cloud of smoke around it to help protect it from predators.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/sulfur_crab/descr: An uncommon medium Coves de Lava crustacean. This Cranc is encased in a thick Groc coating of sulfur on its shell.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/tiny_volcano/desc: A rare Coves de Lava artifact. This geological formation looks a lot like a volcano, except... tiny.
eng.items/mines/lava_caves/warm_rock/descrip: A common Coves de Lava artifact. This rock is ordinary in appearance, but it remains perpetually warm to the touch.
eng.items/mines/ruins/essence_blossom/descri: A flower infused with magic, beautiful and surprisingly resilient.
eng.items/mines/ruins/spell_fruit/descriptio: A fruit with a mouthwatering aroma that's quite mesmerizing.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/archerfish/desc: An uncommon small Tide Caverns fish. It squirts a stream of water to catch bugs.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/cave_kelp/descr: This Alga makes a great thickener for soups. És un ingredient de diverses receptes de cuina.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/coral_mantis/de: An uncommon Tide Caverns insect. Its camouflage has turned this mantis into a work of art.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/coral/descripti: A pretty piece of coral. Found in the Tide Caverns & used for crafting.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/crab_statue/des: A rare artifact. This delicately crafted statue almost seems alive.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/dense_water/des: An uncommon artifact. This water is so dense that it holds its shape even in air.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/hermit_snail/de: An uncommon Tide Caverns insect. Decorates its shell with sand and brightly colored pebbles.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/mines_mussels/d: These mussels grow in bunches underground. És un ingredient de diverses receptes de cuina.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/mini_whale_shar: A rare large Tide Caverns fish. Despite its name, it is still very large.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/puddle_spider/d: An rare Tide Caverns insect. Seems to use the vibrations on puddles to hunt.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/sapphire_betta/: A common small Tide Caverns fish. It has a lovely color.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/sea_grapes/desc: These grapes have a salty pop that adds a briny taste to any dish. És un ingredient de diverses receptes de cuina.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/sea_scarab/desc: An uncommon Tide Caverns insect. Its pretty carapace looks like the sea on a sunny day.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/starlight_coral: A common artifact. This piece of coral glimmers as if reflecting starlight.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/stone_shell/des: A common artifact. When you hold it to your ear, you can hear the sound of water flowing through deep caves.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/tide_lettuce/de: This wild lettuce has a rich flavor and a satisfying crunch. És un ingredient de diverses receptes de cuina.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/tidestone/descr: An uncommon artifact. This chunk of stone appears to grow and shrink slightly along with the tides.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/transparent_jel: A common medium Tide Caverns invertebrate. It evolved in darkness, resulting in an unusual transparent appearance.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/underseaweed/de: This Alga has a mild flavor and bouncy texture. És un ingredient de diverses receptes de cuina.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/water_balloon_f: An uncommon medium Tide Caverns fish. It takes in an impressive amount of water to discourage predators.
eng.items/mines/tide_caverns/waterfly/descri: A common Tide Caverns insect. Like its firefly cousin, it uses its Blau glow to signal.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/cave_eel/descrip: An uncommon medium Upper Mines fish. They build nests out of stone.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/cave_shark/descr: A rare large Upper Mines fish. How did they end up in the Mines?!
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/cave_shrimp/desc: A common small Upper Mines crustacean. Its translucent body gives it a distinct appearance.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/copper_beetle/de: An uncommon Upper Mines insect. Their unique coloration is great camouflage.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/lantern_moth/des: A common Upper Mines insect. They gather near light sources in dark places.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/mine_cricket/des: A rare Upper Mines insect. Their songs are kinda catchy...
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/miners_helmet/de: A rare artifact. There is a worn away name on it that ends with the letter L...
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/miners_pickaxe/d: A common artifact. It's in pretty good condition despite its age.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/miners_rucksack/: An uncommon artifact. It seems to have been down in the Mines a long time.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/miners_slab/desc: An uncommon artifact. It appears to warn of pitfalls ahead.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/narrows_moss/des: A unique species of moss. Very exciting to moss experts.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/rock_guppy/descr: An uncommon small Upper Mines fish. Very similar to a regular guppy.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/shadow_flower/de: A rare flower that only grows in darkness. It makes a unique gift.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/stone_loach/desc: A common medium Upper Mines fish. They easily blend in with the surrounding rocks.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/sweetroot/descri: A root that grows in caves underground. Makes a great snack, even when eaten raw!
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/tin_lunchbox/des: A common artifact. Sadly, it's empty.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/tunnel_millipede: An uncommon Upper Mines insect. Their many legs make quick work of tunneling.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/upper_mines_mush: A wild mushroom with a great flavor and texture. Commonly used as a cooking ingredient.
eng.items/mines/upper_mines/worm/description: An uncommon Upper Mines invertebrate. It's just a worm.

eng.items/other/artifacts/alda_bronze_sword/: A rare artifact. Its intricate carvings and blue-green patina give this Espasa an otherworldly appearance.
eng.items/other/artifacts/alda_clay_pot/desc: An uncommon artifact. Made from rich river clay, a faded pattern can still be seen. Once used by the Alda people to store food.
eng.items/other/artifacts/alda_feather_penda: An uncommon artifact. Once used in marriage proposals, beautifully designed.
eng.items/other/artifacts/alda_gem_bracelet/: A legendary artifact. Non-local gems suggest the Alda had trading partners across the sea.
eng.items/other/artifacts/alda_mural_tablet/: A rare artifact. Depicts a scene of the Mistrian coast, as seen hundreds of years ago.
eng.items/other/artifacts/aldarian_gauntlet/: A rare artifact. This battle-worn gauntlet shows heavy use.
eng.items/other/artifacts/aldarian_sword/des: An uncommon artifact. A worn military Espasa, likely from the War of the Lilies.
eng.items/other/artifacts/aldarian_war_banne: A rare artifact. Emblazoned with the royal crest of Aldaria.
eng.items/other/artifacts/amber_trapped_inse: An uncommon artifact. It's noticeably bigger than today's insects.
eng.items/other/artifacts/ancient_crystal_go: A rare artifact. Elegant and sturdy, this goblet was likely used during Witch Queen rituals.
eng.items/other/artifacts/ancient_gold_coin/: An uncommon artifact. Etched with the outline of the Witch Queen on one side, and a magnificent tower on the other.
eng.items/other/artifacts/ancient_horn_circl: A rare artifact. A horn circlet from the age of the Witch Queens. Was this a fashion accessory or did it serve a greater purpose?
eng.items/other/artifacts/ancient_royal_scep: A legendary artifact. A Royal Scepter with the head of a dragon. The symbol of the Witch Queen's authority.
eng.items/other/artifacts/ancient_stone_lant: An uncommon artifact. An impossibly delicate stone lantern from the age of the Witch Queens. It still retains an ethereal glow from within.
eng.items/other/artifacts/black_tablet/descr: An uncommon artifact. Made of a strange metal, it's not clear what this is for.
eng.items/other/artifacts/caldosian_breastpl: A rare artifact. This magnificent breastplate is so ornate, it was likely used for ceremonial purposes.
eng.items/other/artifacts/caldosian_drinking: A rare artifact. Drinking banyes were usually passed down through the family line.
eng.items/other/artifacts/caldosian_emperor_: An uncommon artifact. The bust of a Caldosian Emperor. It's not clear which one.
eng.items/other/artifacts/caldosian_sword/de: An uncommon artifact. An imperial officer's Espasa from the early days of the Caldosian Empire.
eng.items/other/artifacts/coin_lump/descript: An uncommon artifact. A mass of old coins, fused together by time.
eng.items/other/artifacts/completely_wrong_m: An uncommon artifact. A badly faded map that appears to show a landmass where the Western Bay now lies.
eng.items/other/artifacts/criminal_confessio: An uncommon artifact. Too bad the pages are fused together.
eng.items/other/artifacts/crystal_apple/desc: A rare artifact. Appears to have been infused with essence.
eng.items/other/artifacts/diamond_backed_mir: A rare artifact. The use of diamond here feels impractical.
eng.items/other/artifacts/dragon_claw/descri: An uncommon artifact. Extremely sharp, despite its age. It would make a fine blade, if it wasn't so heavy.
eng.items/other/artifacts/dragon_forged_brac: A rare artifact. An ancient bracelet forged by dragon fire. Strangely, it looks like it would fit a human-sized wrist.
eng.items/other/artifacts/dragon_pact_tablet: A legendary artifact. Written in untranslatable Draconian.
eng.items/other/artifacts/dragon_scale/descr: An uncommon artifact. The passing of thousands of years has hardened this scale into something stronger than steel.
eng.items/other/artifacts/family_crest_penda: An uncommon artifact. Once widely adopted in Aldaria, pendants were given to family members who were leaving home for the first time.
eng.items/other/artifacts/flint_arrowhead/de: An uncommon artifact. Likely lost during a hunt.
eng.items/other/artifacts/fossilized_egg/des: A rare artifact. What could be inside?
eng.items/other/artifacts/fossilized_mandrak: A legendary artifact. Thankfully, it's fossilized.
eng.items/other/artifacts/gathering_basket/d: An uncommon artifact. Still smells faintly of Bell Berries.
eng.items/other/artifacts/giant_fish_scale/d: An uncommon artifact. Can't imagine what fish this came from.
eng.items/other/artifacts/hardened_essence/d: A rare artifact. Magic essence hardened into a gem-like form. There must have been an enormous amount of magic in the world when this was formed.
eng.items/other/artifacts/lost_crown_of_alda: A legendary artifact. Could this be the crown that was lost after the Caldosian Empire's invasion?
eng.items/other/artifacts/mermaids_comb/desc: An uncommon artifact. Looks suspiciously like a fork.
eng.items/other/artifacts/metal_leaf/descrip: A rare artifact. So detailed, it's not clear if it was grown or crafted.
eng.items/other/artifacts/meteorite/descript: A legendary artifact. There's no telling how long ago it fell...
eng.items/other/artifacts/mist_crystal/descr: An uncommon artifact. A strange hollow crystal. If you put your ear to it, you can hear a howling wind.
eng.items/other/artifacts/mist_flute/descrip: A rare artifact. Through unknown means and at random times, this flute will play a haunting melody.
eng.items/other/artifacts/mist_scroll/descri: A rare artifact. The words on this scroll are illegible, due to its constantly shifting lines.
eng.items/other/artifacts/misty_black_mirror: An uncommon artifact. A negre mirror, filled with mist, that thrums with magical power.
eng.items/other/artifacts/misty_feather_quil: An uncommon artifact. This ethereal quill begins to tremble when placed near paper.
eng.items/other/artifacts/muttering_cube/des: An uncommon artifact. This device emits a low hiss most of the time, and occasionally what sounds like voices from far away.
eng.items/other/artifacts/obsidian_blade/des: A rare artifact. The artifact is still dangerously sharp.
eng.items/other/artifacts/perfect_copper_ore: An uncommon artifact. This large chunk of pure copper ore is worthy of display.
eng.items/other/artifacts/perfect_diamond/de: A rare artifact. This diamond is incredibly large and splendid.
eng.items/other/artifacts/perfect_emerald/de: An uncommon artifact. An emerald of this clarity would gain nothing from being worked further.
eng.items/other/artifacts/perfect_gold_ore/d: A rare artifact. This gold ore is incredibly large and splendid.
eng.items/other/artifacts/perfect_iron_ore/d: An uncommon artifact. This chunk of iron is too magnificent to simply melt down.
eng.items/other/artifacts/perfect_mistril_or: A rare artifact. This mistril ore is incredibly large and splendid.
eng.items/other/artifacts/perfect_pink_diamo: A rare artifact. This Diamant Rosa is incredibly large and splendid.
eng.items/other/artifacts/perfect_ruby/descr: A rare artifact. This ruby is incredibly large and splendid.
eng.items/other/artifacts/perfect_sapphire/d: A rare artifact. This unusually large sapphire seems to glow from within.
eng.items/other/artifacts/perfect_silver_ore: An uncommon artifact. The size and sheen on this piece of silver is a work of art.
eng.items/other/artifacts/petrified_wood/des: An uncommon artifact. Incredibly old and beautiful.
eng.items/other/artifacts/rainbow_seaweed/de: An uncommon artifact. Can only be found floating in the current, no one seems to know where it grows.
eng.items/other/artifacts/ritual_beads/descr: An uncommon artifact. Running these beads through your hand evokes a feeling of serenity.
eng.items/other/artifacts/ritual_chalice/des: An uncommon artifact. This ornate chalice was presumably used during ancient rituals.
eng.items/other/artifacts/ritual_incense_bur: An uncommon artifact. The faint scent of incense still clings to this ancient burner.
eng.items/other/artifacts/ritual_scepter/des: A rare artifact. This ritual scepter was likely used by Dragon Priestesses during rituals.
eng.items/other/artifacts/ritual_tablet/desc: A rare artifact. This tablet has a series of pictographs that show how to perform a ritual. It appears that one of the figures is a dragon.
eng.items/other/artifacts/rock_with_a_hole/d: An uncommon artifact. Seems to be naturally formed.
eng.items/other/artifacts/rubber_fish/descri: An uncommon artifact. How did this get in the water in the first place?
eng.items/other/artifacts/rusted_shield/desc: An uncommon artifact. A very old shield with an unusual design.
eng.items/other/artifacts/rusted_treasure_ch: An uncommon artifact. Looks quite valuable, a shame it can't be opened.
eng.items/other/artifacts/shortcut_scroll/de: A legendary artifact. The scroll appears to show a quick and easy route to the bottom of the Mines, but you don't recognize any of the paths.
eng.items/other/artifacts/statuette_of_calda: A legendary artifact. There seems to have been a subset of the empire that once worshiped Caldarus...
eng.items/other/artifacts/stone_horse/descri: An uncommon artifact. Carefully carved and very cute.
eng.items/other/artifacts/tiny_dinosaur_skel: A rare artifact. Definitely not just a lizard.
eng.items/other/artifacts/trilobite_fossil/d: An uncommon artifact. Too many legs, but still kinda cute.
eng.items/other/artifacts/unknown_dragon_sta: An uncommon artifact. This doesn't appear to be Caldarus.
eng.items/other/artifacts/vintage_brush/desc: A rare artifact. This cute vintage tool was used to pet farm animals in years past.
eng.items/other/artifacts/vintage_cow_bell/d: A legendary artifact. This vintage bell would have been used to call vaques home in bygone years.
eng.items/other/artifacts/vintage_hammer/des: An uncommon artifact. This vintage wooden hammer was used to break rocks before Pics were commonplace.
eng.items/other/artifacts/vintage_sickle/des: An uncommon artifact. This vintage sickle was used by past generations to turn grass into fodder.
eng.items/other/artifacts/vintage_watering_c: An uncommon artifact. This vintage Regadora was popular among farmers back in the day.
eng.items/other/artifacts/water_sphere/descr: An uncommon artifact. You're not sure why, but it won't pop.
eng.items/other/artifacts/weightless_stone/d: An uncommon artifact. This negre stone appears otherworldly in origin. It has no weight, and will roll around from the slightest breeze.

eng.items/other/ranching/sheep_wool/descript: Thick and cozy wool from a sheep. És un component de diverses receptes d'artesania.
eng.items/other/ranching/small_animal_seesaw: A decorative toy for small animals to play on when outside. It's very cute!
eng.items/other/unreviewed_new_items/date_ph: A memento from a Festival de la Collita Date you went on. Place it on your wall to view it!
Dansa de la Collita Date Photo
eng.letters/a_birdhouse/local:
Hey [Ari]!

The Hawthorn tree looks like it's grown big enough to support a birdhouse.

Come on over to the Carpenter's Shop if you have time and we can start building one!
eng.letters/a_change_of_greenery/local:
[Ari],

I've been doing everything I can to help the mystery sprout along, but it just doesn't seem to want to grow.

Will you come over and help me brainstorm?
eng.letters/a_duet/local:
[Ari],

I spotted a Blau feather by the Hawthorn tree! 

Meet me at the Cottage Ruins when you have time and we'll do a little bird watching.

Maybe they've found the house we made for them!
eng.letters/a_get_together/local:
Hey neighbor!

I'm hosting a little get together at my place, nothing fancy. I just thought we could all do with some time to unwind. I'd love to have you join us! Stop by if you have a chance.
eng.letters/a_little_while_longer_ssa/local:
[Ari],
Would you like to come over to my place for a meal?

I've been thinking it would be nice to spend some time together. Stop by if you have a moment!
eng.letters/a_little_while_longer_ssa/subjec: Would you like to come over?
eng.letters/a_little_while_longer_ssna/local:
[Ari],
Would you like to come over to my place for a meal?

I've been thinking it would be nice to spend some time together. Stop by if you have a moment!
eng.letters/a_little_while_longer_ssna/subje: Would you like to come over?
eng.letters/a_lost_flower/local:
Dear [Ari],

Would you like to join me for a picnic? I thought it would be nice to spend some time together. Meet me at my cottage if you have the time!
eng.letters/a_rewarding_choice/local:
[Ari]! 

I have an important choice to make, and I wanted to get the thoughts of an average Mistrian to weigh in on it. 

Meet me at my office? 

Thank you!
eng.letters/a_sapling/local:
Hey [Ari], 

Think I got a little ahead of myself with the birdhouse. First thing we're going to need is a tree, huh? 

Please meet me at my room!
eng.letters/adeline_4h_reward_1/local:
[Ari],

Thank you so much for your help yesterday! I know everyone in town will really appreciate these extra materials, and I'm sure you'll put yours to good use.

This was a great choice!
eng.letters/adeline_4h_reward_2/local:
[Ari],

Thank you so much for your help yesterday! We got the shipment of cookies in this morning, and it made the whole Casa Pairal smell like a bakery!

I hope you enjoy your cookie (Eiland already ate his...).

This was a great choice!
eng.letters/adept_kitchen_unlock/local:
[Ari],

The Level 3 Kitchen is now in stock at the Carpenter's Shop. Stop by when you want to upgrade!
eng.letters/an_open_book/local:
[Ari], 

Your farm has been a boon to Mistria's economy. 

As the person handling your shipments I have some advice that might interest you. 

Meet me at La taverna when you have the time!
eng.letters/an_outside_consultant/local:
[Ari],

After much careful analysis, and with the additional pressure of the panacea being used up, I have decided to gather my notes and bring in an outside consultant.

Could you meet me at the Banys Termals? I suspect that negotiations will be... tricky.
eng.letters/apple_juice_recipe/local:
Hi [Ari]!

Mom said I could send this one because apple juice is my favorite!

Um, I mean thanks for the apple shipment!
eng.letters/ari_birthday_adeline/local:
[Ari],

A very happy birthday to you!

Enclosed is a Llimona Pie I had specially ordered for you, hope you enjoy it!
eng.letters/ari_birthday_balor/local:
[Ari],

Hope it's a great one!

I've included a curry that's a personal favorite of mine, I think you'll enjoy it as well.
eng.letters/ari_birthday_caldarus/local:
[Ari],

Congratulations on completing another yearly cycle.

Please accept this gift that I have prepared for you.
eng.letters/ari_birthday_celine/local:
[Ari],

I hope you have a wonderful day!

Please enjoy the tea, I brewed it myself!
eng.letters/ari_birthday_celine/subject_line: Wishing you a very Happy Birthday!
eng.letters/ari_birthday_eiland/local:
[Ari],

A birthday just isn't quite the same without cake, wouldn't you agree?

I've included one I think you'll agree is quite delicious!
eng.letters/ari_birthday_hayden/local:
[Ari],

Personally I make it a point for every year that goes by to find something new to appreciate in life.

I've included one of those things with this letter, maybe you'll appreciate it as much as I do!
eng.letters/ari_birthday_juniper/local:
[Ari],

Congratulations, I suppose. I've included a dish I quite like.

Don't worry if it's gone cold, it's even better that way.
eng.letters/ari_birthday_march/local:
[Ari],

I had some Lingots lying around, figured you could use them.
eng.letters/ari_birthday_reina/local:
[Ari],

A birthday should include plenty of good things to eat, don't you think?

I've sent along something scrumptious that I made just for you!
eng.letters/ari_birthday_ryis/local:
[Ari],

Be sure to pamper yourself a bit, you deserve it.

Here's to another year of working on fun projects with you!
eng.letters/ari_birthday_valen/local:
[Ari],

Birthdays are a wonderful opportunity to reflect on everything you've accomplished in the past year.

You've done so much, and that should be celebrated!
eng.letters/baked_potato_recipe/local:
[Ari],

Balor delivered your shipment of Patates this morning. We're so excited to have new produce in!

Please accept this baked Patata recipe as thanks!

Enjoy,
eng.letters/baked_sweetroot/local:
Patron [Ari],

I'm glad to see you've come across Sweetroot in the Mines, an excellent find!

Here's a simple recipe for Baked Sweetroot, passed on to me when I was just a greenhorn. You'll find it keeps your energy up!

Happy eating,
eng.letters/batch_312/local:
[Ari], 

Have you come across any peat while you've been out digging? 

I'm told it can be found quite often when searching for artifacts. I believe that it could be useful to my research. 

Could you bring me a piece? I'm happy to pay for it.
eng.letters/beet_salad_recipe/local:
Hello [Ari],

I was happy to find beets in stock at the store this morning. It made me think that you might like to try out my favorite beet salad recipe.

Thanks for your hard work,
eng.letters/bell_berry_bakewell_tart_recipe/:
[Ari],

With els Deep Woods reopened, I've been experimenting with new recipes from the ingredients there!

I think this one turned out good enough to share with you.
eng.letters/bird_song/local:
[Ari], 

Do you have any extra wood to spare from clearing your farm? 

We're working on a project and supplies are short in Mistria at the moment. 

I can pay 150t for 15 pieces! Just drop it off with me when you have it!
eng.letters/braised_burdock_recipe/local:
[Ari],

The shipment of burdock root we received this morning was perfect! Please find attached my recipe for braised burdock.

I hope you like it!
eng.letters/cabbage_slaw_recipe/local:
[Ari],

Your cabbage shipment made my morning! Try out this recipe for cabbage slaw if you have any left over.

Thanks again,
eng.letters/candied_lemon_peel_recipe/local:
[Ari],

Balor dropped off your Llimona shipment this morning! It made me think you might like this recipe for candied lemon peel.

Enjoy!
eng.letters/candied_strawberries_recipe/loca:
[Ari],

Thank you for the shipment of strawberries! I thought you might like this recipe for a simple Maduixa dessert.

Keep up the hard work!
eng.letters/candied_walnuts_recipe/local:
Hey, [Ari]!

Candied Walnuts are a bit of a wintertime tradition here in Mistria, so I thought you'd like the recipe!
eng.letters/chief_inspector/local:
[Ari],

It's time for my next inspection of Mistria! It's important work, would you like to come along for it?

If you do, meet me at the Request Board!
eng.letters/coconut_milk_recipe/local:
Hi there [Ari],

I'm a big fan of all things Coco, so I was glad to see your shipment in the Supermercat this morning!

I thought you might like my recipe for coconut milk.

Enjoy!
eng.letters/copper_fishing_rod_unlocked/loca:
[Ari],

I wanted to let you know that I now have Canya de Pescar de Coure in stock. Stop by anytime if you want to upgrade!
eng.letters/copper_fishing_rod_unlocked/subj: New Arrival: Canya de Pescar de Coure!
eng.letters/copper_star_rank_letter/local:
[Ari],

Congratulations! Mistria has reached the Copper Star Town Rank.

This means we have officially earned back our pre-earthquake rank!

I believe I speak for the whole town when I say thank you, [Ari].

Eiland and I baked you a little something to celebrate!
eng.letters/cozy_kitchen_unlock/local:
[Ari],

The Level 2 Kitchen is now available at the Carpenter's Shop. You should stop by and check it out!
eng.letters/crafting_tutorial/local:
Hey [Ari], 

I've been thinking about what a big task it is to get your farm back in shape. 

If you can bring me 10 Wood, I can give you a quick overview on how to start crafting the things you'll need, like fences.
eng.letters/cranberry_juice_recipe/local:
[Ari],

Thank you for your shipment of fresh cranberries! Try out this recipe for Nabiu juice if you have any left over.

Enjoy!
eng.letters/crown_requests_unlocked/local:
[Ari],

Exciting news has arrived from the King!

Now that Mistria has reached the Sapphire Star Town Rank, we will be receiving weekly Crown Requests straight from the Capital!

Crown Requests are reserved for high-ranking towns, and each is worth a lot of Renown. Be sure to visit the Request Board, I just posted our first one!
eng.letters/crystal_berry_pie_recipe/local:
[Ari],

Those Crystal Berries you shipped looked delicious! I thought they might make a good pie... and they did!

Here's the recipe!
eng.letters/cucumber_salad_recipe/local:
[Ari],

The shipment of Cogombre we received from you this morning was excellent! Here's my recipe for cucumber salad.

Give it a try!
eng.letters/deep_sea_soup/local:
Hey [Ari]!

That Jade Dulse you donated to the Museu reminded me of a recipe I saw in a cookbook I borrowed!

You'll need a few more ingredients, but it's super healthy and tastes really good!

Just, um, ignore how green it is. That's how you know you made it right, I promise!
eng.letters/diamond_star_rank_letter/local:
[Ari],

I can't believe it! Mistria has reached the Diamond Star Town Rank! 

That means that Mistria now ranks among the topmost towns in the kingdom.

If we keep gaining renown like this, they might have to create a new rank just for us!

(Further renown levels and rewards will arrive later in Early Access!)
eng.letters/elsie_dating_followup/local:
[Ari],

Now that els Deep Woods is accessible again, you should consider taking your partner on a Date there some weekend!

I've included a Ítems d'Inspiració per a Cita for you. Enjoy!
eng.letters/emerald_star_rank_letter/local:
[Ari],

I'm delighted to announce Mistria has reached the Emerald Star Town Rank!

This couldn't have been possible without all your hard work. On behalf of the whole town, thank you for your hard work and dedication.
eng.letters/extra_feed/local:
Hey [Ari]! 

Wouldn't you know it, my last farratge shipment had a few extra bags. 

If you'd care to stop by my farm, they're yours!
eng.letters/farm_fresh_sous_chef/local:
[Ari]!

Can you meet me at La taverna when you have a chance? I have something important to ask you.
eng.letters/for_good_ssa/local:
[Ari],

Sorry I had to take a rain check on our last get together.

Would you like to join me for a meal? No interruptions this time.

Meet me in my room at La taverna.
eng.letters/for_good_ssa/subject_line: Join me for a private meal?
eng.letters/for_good_ssna/local:
[Ari],

Sorry I had to take a rain check on our last get together.

Would you like to join me for a meal? No interruptions this time.

Meet me in my room at La taverna.
eng.letters/friday_at_the_sleeping_dragon_in:
Hey [Ari]!

Mistria has a tradition where everyone gathers at the Taverna el Drac Dormilega on Friday nights! That's tonight, and this is your invitation!

Meet me at La taverna after 6 PM tonight. Keep me company and I'll throw in a free drink!
Friday at the Taverna el Drac Dormilega
eng.letters/gold_fishing_rod_unlocked/local:
[Ari],

For a true angler like yourself, you won't find better than a Canya de Pescar d'Or! Come on down to my shop and take a look!
eng.letters/gold_fishing_rod_unlocked/subjec: Canya de Pescar d'Or for Sale!
eng.letters/gold_ore/local:
Hey [Ari]!

We've been having a hard time getting consistent shipments of Gold Ore lately.

If you were able to reach the lower levels of the Mines, you might be able to find some!

I know it would mean a lot to March if we could start getting local shipments again. 

Just thought I'd mention it!
eng.letters/gold_star_rank_letter/local:
[Ari],

I am so excited to announce Mistria has reached the Gold Star Town Rank!

What an incredible honor! We owe it in large part to your efforts. Wonderful job!
eng.letters/gold_tools_unlocked/local:
[Ari],

Crafting with gold is the pinnacle of the Blacksmith's art, come and see for yourself.
eng.letters/gold_tools_unlocked/subject_line: Gold Tools and Armadura have Arrived.
eng.letters/greet_the_vendors/local:
[Ari],

The Saturday Market is finally back in town!

Please go and introduce yourself to this week's vendors. Then come talk to me for a reward!
eng.letters/grilled_corn_recipe/local:
[Ari],

Thank you for the wonderful corn shipment! Why don't you try out this simple recipe for grilled corn?

Enjoy!
eng.letters/harvest_festival_patch_case/loca:
[Ari],

El Festival de la Collita is coming up on Fall 10!

Be sure to collect as many Queen Berries as you can between now and then. There will be all kinds of prizes to win, a community feast, and even a dance!

Berry collecting normally starts on Fall 7, so I've included a few of my own berries to get you started this year.
eng.letters/harvest_festival_patch_case/subj: Get ready for el Festival de la Collita!
eng.letters/horsing_around/local:
[Ari], 

I've prepared a potion to test on you, so come to the Banys Termals. 

Don't make me wait too long, or I might just test it on someone else.
eng.letters/iron_fishing_rod_unlocked/local:
[Ari],

I just got a new Canya de Pescar de Ferro in that would be perfect for a talented angler such as yourself. Come on by if you want to upgrade!
eng.letters/iron_fishing_rod_unlocked/subjec: New Arrival: Canya de Pescar de Ferro!
eng.letters/iron_star_rank_letter/local:
[Ari],

Congratulations! Mistria has reached the Iron Star Town Rank!

What a proud day for Mistria! Mother sent an overnight letter to share the news herself!

And of course, the Capital has once again included a reward to mark the occasion!
eng.letters/iron_tools_unlocked/local:
[Ari],

I've updated our shop selection with iron tools and Armadura. You could craft them yourself... but you're probably not skilled enough.
eng.letters/iron_tools_unlocked/subject_line: Iron Tools & Armadura are in Stock.
eng.letters/large_farm_buildings_unlocked/lo:
[Ari],

The blueprints for Estable grans and coops are now available at the Carpenter Shop. You can fit up to 12 animals in each!
eng.letters/large_farm_buildings_unlocked/su: Need Even More Space for Animals?
eng.letters/lemonade_from_lemons/local:
[Ari],

My business is booming and it's all thanks to you.

Join me for a meal at La taverna? Let's celebrate our success and toast to a bright future!
eng.letters/life_in_this_form/local:
Greetings [Ari],

I was hoping that you might join me for a meal, if you have the time. There is something that I would like to speak with you about.

Please meet me at my temple, at your convenience.
eng.letters/lost_track_of_time_ssa/local:
Dear [Ari],

I was wondering if you might like to come over for tea? I freed up some time in my schedule and I thought we could spend it together.

Stop by the Casa Pairal if you have time!
eng.letters/lost_track_of_time_ssna/local:
Dear [Ari],

I was wondering if you might like to come over for tea? I freed up some time in my schedule and I thought we could spend it together.

Stop by the Casa Pairal if you have time!
eng.letters/many_hands_make_light_work/local:
Hey [Ari]! 

Are you busy? March and I sure are! We can hardly keep up with all our work. 

March told me your blacksmithing has been improving, and that I shouldn't tell you he said that. Buuuut what I think he meant to say was "I sure hope [Ari] can help us out!" 

Hope to see you at the forge soon!

Your pal,
eng.letters/medium_farm_buildings_unlocked/l:
[Ari],

The blueprints for medium barns and coops are now available at the Carpenter's Shop. You can fit up to 8 animals in each!
eng.letters/medium_farm_buildings_unlocked/s: Need More Space for your Animals?
eng.letters/miners_mushroom_stew/local:
Esteemed [Ari],

Your recent donation of mushrooms from the Mines jogged my memory!

Find enclosed the recipe for a dish I used to make for the mining crew after a long day's work.

It's especially hearty in the wintertime, but delicious in all seasons.

Best,
eng.letters/museum_donation_wanted/local:
Dear [Ari],

As the curator of Mistria's Museu, I'm delighted to share that we have unveiled a series of tiered rewards to encourage donations to our collection. 

Please stop by the Museum west of town at your earliest convenience.
eng.letters/new_animals_in_stock/local:
[Ari],

Alpacas and Capybaras are now available at Granja Aiguadolça!

Stop by and take a look if you're interested!
eng.letters/onion_soup_recipe/local:
[Ari],

The shipment of Ceba we received from you this morning was great! Here's my recipe for onion soup.

Give it a try!
eng.letters/orange_juice_recipe/local:
[Ari],

Thank you for your taronja shipment! Here's a quick and easy recipe for taronja juice.

It's good for you!
eng.letters/peaches_and_cream_recipe/local:
Hi [Ari]!

I saw your Préssec shipment at the Supermercat this morning and wanted to share one of my favorite recipes!

It's for peaches and cream. I hope you like it!
eng.letters/pie_in_the_sky/local:
[Ari] 

You've been in town too long without getting to taste test a new dish of mine. I think I've got just the recipe to try out on a hardworking farmer like you. 

Come by La taverna when you get a chance!
eng.letters/pie_in_the_sky/subject_line: In Need Of A Taste Tester
eng.letters/poached_pear_recipe/local:
Dear [Ari],

When I saw your pear shipment in the Supermercat this morning, I knew I had to make some poached pears!

I thought I would share my recipe with you.

Enjoy!
eng.letters/pomegranate_sorbet_recipe/local:
Dear [Ari],

Did you know that you can blend Magrana with ice to make a wonderful pomegranate sorbet?

Try it, you'll love it!
eng.letters/post_carpenters_upgrade/local:
[Ari], 

Congratulations again on the completion of the Carpenter's Shop upgrade!

I'm in awe of how far Mistria has come since you first arrived.

I'm working on additional plans for the town's future, but in the meantime, please accept this reward!

(Further town improvement quests will arrive later in Early Access!)
eng.letters/potions_and_errands/local:
[Ari],

I'm working on a new type of bath infusion, but it requires a "Breath of Flame" flower. They can be found deep within the Mines. Bring one to me.

When you do, be sure to wear something you don't mind getting wet. You're going to test it for me!
eng.letters/procuring_the_sealing_scroll/loc:
[Ari],

Meet me in my room when you have a moment, I have a lead on your special order.
eng.letters/pumpkin_stew_recipe/local:
[Ari],

It really feels like Fall now that we have your Carbassa shipment in stock! I thought you might like this recipe for pumpkin stew.

Thanks as always!
eng.letters/real_fine_day/local:
[Ari],

Would you come to the Supermercat?

I've got a fun and educational time all planned out to help socialize Henrietta!
eng.letters/repair_haydens_barn/local:
[Ari], 

Could you meet me at Hayden's farm? I have a new project for the town that I think you'll be very excited for!
eng.letters/repair_the_beach_bridge/local:
[Ari], 

Could you meet Adeline and me at la Platja? The Supermercat getting spruced up got me thinking that there's plenty of other places in Mistria that could use some shine on 'em!
eng.letters/repair_the_bridge/local:
[Ari],

I'm sure you noticed the state of the bridge into town when you arrived. 

I'd like to introduce you to a group of us that are spearheading a repair plan. 

Could you meet with us at the bridge east of town?
eng.letters/repair_the_general_store/local:
[Ari], 

Could you meet me at the Supermercat? It's time to unveil Phase 2 of my plan to revitalize Mistria.
eng.letters/repair_the_inn/local:
[Ari],

It's time to discuss what's next for Mistria.

Could you meet me at La taverna?
eng.letters/repair_the_mill/local:
[Ari], 

El Molí was damaged in the earthquake, and it's high time we repaired it! 

A working mill is essential to the town and will let you process all sorts of new products. 

Meet me in my office up at the casa pairal!
eng.letters/repair_the_summit_stairs/local:
[Ari],

Now that Mistria has its basic necessities met, I'd like to pivot our focus to a real morale booster for the town.

Would you meet Eiland and me in front of the Casa Pairal?
eng.letters/replenishing_mistrias_food_reser:
[Ari],

I hope this letter finds you well.

Can you meet me at the casa pairal when you have the time? I'd like to discuss Mistria's emergency supply reserves with you.

[Ari], 

We've hit a snag on replenishing our food reserves.

Can you meet with Hayden, Reina and me at Hayden's farm?
eng.letters/roasted_cauliflower_recipe/local:
[Ari],

Thank you for your shipment of cauliflower! I thought you might like to try out this recipe for roasted cauliflower if you have any left over.

I hope you enjoy it!
eng.letters/roasted_sweet_potato_recipe/loca:
[Ari],

The Moniatos from your last shipment are proving popular! Please accept this recipe for roasted Moniato.

I hope you enjoy it!
eng.letters/rose_tea_recipe/local:
[Ari],

I was so pleased to see the tea you grew at the Supermercat this morning! Thought you might like this recipe for rose tea. It's one of my favorites!

Thanks again!
eng.letters/ruby_star_rank_letter/local:
[Ari],

Congratulations! Mistria has reached the Ruby Star Town Rank!

This is the highest our rank has ever been! Thank you for believing in this little town of ours.

I've included a reward we received straight from the Capital for you!
eng.letters/salted_watermelon_recipe/local:
[Ari],

It's so nice to have some fresh Síndria in town! I thought you might like this simple recipe for salted watermelon.

Thanks again!
eng.letters/sapphire_star_rank_letter/local:
[Ari],

Congratulations! Mistria has reached the Sapphire Star Town Rank!

What an achievement. We now rank among the top half of all towns in Aldaria! Mother and Father are delighted.

They said to expect news this week from the king himself. I wonder what it could be?
eng.letters/sauteed_snow_peas_recipe/local:
[Ari],

Thank you for the shipment of Pèsols de Neu! Why don't you try out this simple recipe if you have any left over?

Enjoy!
eng.letters/shield_of_the_realm/local:
[Ari],

Stop by if you want some part-time work.
eng.letters/shooting_star_morning_letter/loc:
[Ari],

Tonight is el Festival de l'Estel Fugaç!

Since you're new to town, I thought you might not know how to make the traditional decorations yet. You don't necessarily need them in order to celebrate, but I think every Mistrian should have a set!
eng.letters/shopping_buddy/local:
Hey [Ari]! 

If you're free, I could use a shopping buddy! I want to pick out ingredients that'll really wow the judges. 

Meet me at the Supermercat when you've got time!
eng.letters/silver_fishing_rod_unlocked/loca:
[Ari],

I've added a Canya de Pescar de Plata to my shop that's very nearly a work of art. Stop by and take a look, it's worth seeing in person!
eng.letters/silver_fishing_rod_unlocked/subj: New Arrival: Canya de Pescar de Plata!
eng.letters/silver_star_rank_letter/local:
[Ari],

Congratulations! Mistria has reached the Silver Star Town Rank!

Mother and Father are reporting that Mistria's reputation throughout the kingdom has never been better. The completed Crown Requests must be making an impact!

I have attached your reward from the Capital!
eng.letters/silver_tools_unlocked/local:
[Ari],

Silver tools and Armadura are now available at our shop. We don't offer payment plans for them, so don't ask.
eng.letters/silver_tools_unlocked/subject_li: Silver Tools & Armadura are in Stock.
eng.letters/simmered_daikon_recipe/local:
[Ari],

We received your shipment of Rave Daikon this morning! Here's my recipe for simmered daikon.

Why not give it a try?
eng.letters/sliced_turnip_recipe/local:
[Ari],

We received your shipment of Naps this morning from Balor. You're doing great work over there!

I've attached my recipe for sliced turnips, I thought you might want to try it out.

Enjoy,
eng.letters/spicy_water_chestunut_recipe/loc:
[Ari],

Balor dropped off your Pebrot Xili shipment this morning! I thought you might like this recipe for spicy water Castanyes.

Thanks again!
eng.letters/spirit_mushroom_tea_recipe/local:
[Ari],

If you're a fan of mushrooms, I think you'll enjoy this recipe for a soothing cup of Spirit Mushroom Tea.
eng.letters/steamed_broccoli_recipe/local:
[Ari],

Balor dropped off your shipment of broccoli with us! I thought you might like this recipe for steamed broccoli.

Thanks again!
eng.letters/stone_refinery/local:
[Ari]!

I've just received some very exciting news from the King's Council, could you please meet me at the entrance to the Mines?
eng.letters/stone_star_rank_letter/local:
[Ari],

Congratulations! Mistria has reached the Stone Star Town Rank!

We couldn't have done it without your help. Mistria is sure to make a full recovery with your continued assistance.

Please accept this token of thanks!
eng.letters/surprise_me/local:
[Ari],

Meet me at the Blacksmith's, and don't keep me waiting.
eng.letters/tea_with_hayden/local:
[Ari],
Can't thank you enough for your work on el molí! 

If you've got time, come on over to my place! I'll put the kettle on and we can talk ranching and raising animals.
eng.letters/the_aldarian_cooking_contest/loc:
[Ari],

The judges are on their way to Mistria! Meet me at La taverna and let's get cooking!
eng.letters/the_glade_hint/local:
Dear [Ari],

I haven't had any luck finding a clear lead on the next piece of the Dragonsworn Armadura set yet. I've searched all around town to no avail...

It may be worth exploring the deeper levels of the mines to see if that leads anywhere!
eng.letters/the_glade/local:
Dear [Ari],

I'm still searching for a lead on the next piece of the Dragonsworn Armadura set, but I was hoping we could spend some time together anyway.

Els Deep Woods are beautiful this time of year. Would you care to join me for a walk? 

If you have the time, please meet me there.
eng.letters/the_glade/subject_line: Shall we go for a walk?
eng.letters/the_manor/local:
[Ari],

Can you pay me a visit at home?

The search for the next piece of the Dragonsworn Armadura has taken an unexpected turn.
eng.letters/the_panacea/local:
[Ari], 

The Cliffblossom has so far proven elusive.

I'm planning to do a thorough investigation of the cliffs at les Ruines de l'Oest, would you care to meet me there?

If nothing else, I would certainly appreciate your company.
eng.letters/the_ruins/local:
[Ari], 

The new text you uncovered has been an enormous help regarding the whereabouts of the Dragonsworn Armadura. 

I have every reason to believe that we can discover more at les Ruines de l'Oest. 

Meet me there and we can begin!
eng.letters/the_smell_of_drying_ink/local:
[Ari], 

You've already taken such a keen interest in so much of the goings on around Mistria, would you be interested in getting a closer look at La tavernaer workings of our government? 

Come meet me in my office at the Casa Pairal and be prepared for fun!
eng.letters/the_stele/local:
[Ari], 

I'm sure by now you've seen that Mistria is full of ancient places, with many more still left to discover. 

If you're interested, meet me at the Casa Pairal and I can show you a particularly interesting site on the grounds!
eng.letters/the_unusual_seed/local:
[Ari], 

Could you come to my house when you have a moment? 

I've got a question about a flower that I hope you can help with!
eng.letters/toasted_sunflower_seeds_recipe/l:
[Ari],

Your Gira-sol shipment was lovely to see! Did you know you can roast their seeds to make a tasty snack? It's one of my favorites.

I've included the recipe for you. Enjoy!
eng.letters/tomato_soup_recipe/local:
[Ari],

The Tomàquetes from your last shipment are already flying off the shelves! Please accept this recipe for my famous tomato soup.

I hope you enjoy it!
eng.letters/unlocking_the_mines_pt_1/local:
[Ari], 

I need your help with something important! 

Please meet myself and Curator Errol at the Museu west of town to discuss the reopening of the Mines.
eng.letters/unlocking_the_mines_pt_2/local:
[Ari],

In regards to the Mines...

Eiland has informed me that Mistria's rank has been raised to Stone Star, and I have agreed to meet with him to further discuss the Mines. 

Please meet us at the Mine's Entrance west of town, [Ari].
eng.letters/upgrade_the_carpenters_shop/loca:
[Ari],

Could you meet me at the Carpenter's Shop? I'd like to talk to you about the town's next upgrade.
eng.letters/upgrade_the_saturday_market/loca:
[Ari],

I have amazing news to share, regarding the Saturday Market!

Stop by when you get a chance and I'll fill you in!
eng.letters/water_and_soil/local:
[Ari], 

The seed we found still hasn't sprouted... 

I've been doing research into it and I'm starting to think its growth conditions might be very particular. 

Could you come over and lend me your insight as a farmer as well? It'd be very appreciated!
eng.letters/weather_globe_letter/local:
[Ari],

Dozy absolutely insisted that I send you an extra token of apology for nearly knocking you out with my experimental potion yesterday...

Here's a magical object that you might find useful. If you can figure out what it does.

Oh ho ho ho!
eng.letters/working_like_a_dog/local:
[Ari],

I'm in the middle of an important piece of spellwork and need you to handle some menial errands for me.

Come to my room at the Banys Termals.

Oh, and wear something nice. I don't want you to embarrass me in that typical getup you throw on.
eng.locations/celines_room/name: Caseta de camp de la Celine
eng.misc_local/building_occupied_description: Has de treure els animals d'aquest edifici abans de treure'l!
eng.misc_local/can_burn_fruit_trees: L'Alè Dracònic Afecta a les Fruites
eng.misc_local/cannot_save_outside_home_data: Només pots guardar a dins de casa teva!
eng.misc_local/cannot_sleep_outside_home_dat: Només pots dormir a dins de casa teva!

eng.misc_local/confirm_sell_animals_plural: Segur que vols vendre aquests animals?
eng.misc_local/confirm_sell_animals_singular: Segur que vols vendre aquest animal?

eng.misc_local/crafting_storage_enable: Vols que els continguts d'aquest cofre s'emprin en artesanies?

Hem equilibrat el joc i els horaris dels PNJs per a ésser jugar amb el mode estàndard (per defecte).

Triar dies més llargs pot resultar en una experiència menys òptima.
eng.misc_local/day_time_speed_adjustment_not: Recorda: el canvi s'aplicarà un cop hagis dormit en el joc.
eng.misc_local/daycare_confirmation: Vols guardar l'animal a la guarderia? El pots treure quan vulguis.
eng.misc_local/daycare_remove_confirmation: Do you want to move this animal back to your farm?
eng.misc_local/delete_save_confirmation: Segur que vols esborrar aquest fitxer de guardat? No el podràs recuperar.
eng.misc_local/exit_confirm: Segur que vols sortir del joc?
eng.misc_local/failed_to_save_body: No s'ha pogut escriure el teu fitxer de guardat. Assegura't que tens prou espai al disc.
eng.misc_local/farm_building_select_title: Escull un nou edifici per al teu animal...
eng.misc_local/go_to_shooting_star_confirmat:
Vola anar al Festival de l'Estel Fugaç?

Acabaràs el dia!
eng.misc_local/high_res_in_cutscenes: Forçar Buffers de Pantalles High-Res a les Cutscenes
eng.misc_local/input_toolbar_inc_up: Següent Ítem a la Barra d'eines
eng.misc_local/invalid_header_body: Malauradament, hi ha un problema amb un dels teus fitxers de guardat i no es pot utilitzar.
eng.misc_local/invalid_save_body: Malauradament, hi ha un problema amb un aquest fitxer de guardat i no es pot utilitzar. Prova'n un de diferent.
eng.misc_local/invalid_vault_body: Malauradament, hi ha un problema amb un dels teus fitxers de guardat i no es pot utilitzar. Per favor, envia un informe.
eng.misc_local/invalid_vault: No es poden Actualitzar els Guardats
eng.misc_local/invite_npc_to_festival: Invita a un vilatà/na/ni al festival.
eng.misc_local/late_warning: Es fa tard... Hauries de tornar a casa!
eng.misc_local/legendary_fish_nearby: Tens un peix llegendari a prop...
eng.misc_local/low_spec_warning: Emprar un buffer de pantalla low-res pot millorar el rendiment (sobretot en pantalles de gran resolució) però el moviment pot tornar-se menys suau.
eng.misc_local/missing_mount_input_descripti: No tens cap tecla vinculada a convocar la teva muntura. Pots vincular-la a la pàgina de configuració del teu diari!
eng.misc_local/move_description: If you're stuck somewhere, you can use this button to teleport yourself to a safe place.
eng.misc_local/new_animal_cosmetic_available: Pots equipar aquest cosmètic al menú d'animals!
eng.misc_local/new_cosmetic_available: Pots equipar aquest cosmètic al menú de customització!
eng.misc_local/new_pet_cosmetic_available: Pots equipar aquest cosmètic al menú de mascotes!
eng.misc_local/new_reward_available: Hi ha una nova recompensa al cofre del costat del tauló d'anuncis!
eng.misc_local/one_stick_mode: Joysticks Esquerre i Dret fan el mateix
eng.misc_local/oversleep_penalty_warning: Hem equilibrat el joc per a ésser jugar amb el penalitzador d'adormir-se. Deshabilitar-lo  pot resultar en una experiència menys òptima.
eng.misc_local/pause_audio_on_unfocus: Pausar l'Audio quan treguis el focus
eng.misc_local/pregnant_cannot_move_descript: [ANIMAL_NAME] està esperant una cria. No es pot moure.
eng.misc_local/pregnant_cannot_sell_descript: [ANIMAL_NAME] is expecting a child and cannot be sold.
eng.misc_local/press_again_to_confirm: Torna a prèmer per a confirmar...
eng.misc_local/pull_from_mist: Agafar un ítem de dins la boira?
eng.misc_local/romantic_choice_warning: Si et saltes l'escena, perdràs l'oportunitat de prendre una decisió important en la teva relació amb {}. Segur que vols continuar?
eng.misc_local/select_animal_for_competition: Vols que {} competeixi a la competició?
eng.misc_local/skip_cutscene_confirmation: Segur que et vols saltar la cutscene?
eng.misc_local/speak_to_adeline_animal_fest: Parla amb l'Adeline quan vulguis que comenci la competició.
eng.misc_local/start_activity_with: Vols començar l'activitat amb {}? La completaràs en {} hores.
eng.misc_local/todo_move_in_animal_scene: TODO: a cute scene of the animal arriving at their new home
eng.misc_local/todo_send_to_daycare_scene: TODO: a cute scene of the animal arriving at Hayden's farm

eng.misc_local/warning_one_stick_mode: Habilitar-ho també desvincularà el Joystick dret de tot Input. Vols continuar?

eng.museum_wings/fish/sets/fall_pond/descrip: A collection of fish found in the pond during Fall.
eng.museum_wings/fish/sets/fall_river/descri: A collection of fish found in the river during Fall.

eng.perks/a_day_well_spent/description: Going to bed with zero stamina gives a stamina boost the next day.
eng.perks/a_way_to_the_heart/description: Cooked Dishes given as Loved Gifts will reward more Punts de Cor than before.
eng.perks/abyssal_ascendence/description: You now have a chance to fish up an Abyssal Chest that drops a unique set of clothing or una Pedra d'Essència, dredged up from mysterious sunken ruins.
eng.perks/ancient_inspiration/description: Crafting any object has a weekly chance of inspiring a new recipe from a unique recipe set.
eng.perks/appealing_reeling_two/description: Fish will become attracted to your Bobber from an even greater range.
eng.perks/appealing_reeling/description: Fish will become attracted to your Bobber from a greater range.
eng.perks/aquatic_antiquities/description: Aquatic Artifacts can sometimes be fished up.
eng.perks/award_winning/description: Cooked Dishes given as Liked Gifts will reward more Punts de Cor than before.
eng.perks/back_in_vogue_two/description: Artifacts now sell for an additional 25% more tesserae.
eng.perks/back_in_vogue/description: Artifacts will now sell for 25% more tesserae.
eng.perks/barnyard_bounty_three/description: Sheep and Rabbits will sometimes drop extra Produce.
eng.perks/barnyard_bounty_two/description: Ànecs and Cavalls will sometimes drop extra Produce.
eng.perks/barnyard_bounty/description: Gallines and Vaques will sometimes drop extra Produce.
eng.perks/bountiful/description: Watering a crop will occasionally drop a Seed version of it.
eng.perks/break_one_get_two/description: Crafting a recipe at the Refineria de Pedra will sometimes create a bonus crafted item.
eng.perks/caffeine_crimes/description: Consuming an item with the Speedy infusion will now double both its speed boost and the buff's duration.
eng.perks/catch_of_the_day/description: Catching a Fish will sometimes refund the Stamina used.
eng.perks/close_bond/description: Animals that have been Pet and Fed for the day will receive an extra Heart Point increase.
eng.perks/copper_expert/description: The amount of Copper Ore required to craft Copper Lingots will be reduced by 1.
eng.perks/currency_of_care_three/description: Animals can now be fed cooked dishes and will reward more Shiny Beads based on the dish's star level.
eng.perks/currency_of_care_two/description: Animals that have been Pet and Fed for the day will sometimes drop Shiny Bead the next day in addition to their regular Produce.
eng.perks/currency_of_care/description: When animals eat crops, either by hand feeding or by grazing, they will drop the currency Shiny Beads.
eng.perks/deliberate_debris/description: Farm debris will spawn 50% less often.
eng.perks/dinner_for_two/description: Cooking a dish will sometimes create a bonus extra dish.
eng.perks/discount_treats/description: Heart shaped treats sold by Hayden will have a 10% price reduction.
eng.perks/dungeon_delicacies/description: Certain Cooked Dishes will occasionally drop from Treasure Chests in the Mines.
eng.perks/earth_breaker_two/description: Breaking a Rock in the Mines will occasionally destroy all other Rocks in a 1x3 area around it and is now more likely to occur.
eng.perks/earth_breaker/description: Breaking a Rock in the Mines will occasionally destroy all other Rocks in a 1x3 area around it.
eng.perks/earthly_essence/description: Harvested crops now have a low chance of dropping a Magic Seed. Who knows what will grow if you plant it?
eng.perks/eastern_road_scholar/description: An additional Dig Site will appear daily on el Camí de l'Est.
eng.perks/empowered_two/description: Crafting a Tool, Weapon, or Armadura will be a bit more likely to result in an available Infused version than before.
eng.perks/empowered/description: Crafting a Tool, Weapon, or Armadura will be more likely to result in an available Infused version.
eng.perks/fairy_cooking/description: Cooking a Four star dish and above will occasionally result in a bonus Fairy Infusion, which grants a One-Time Revival buff when consumed.
eng.perks/fantastic_finds/description: You can no longer find Wooden Treasure Chests, and you are now more likely to find a higher tier of Treasure Chests.
eng.perks/feed_prepper/description: The Craft Time for all farratge is reduced by 10 minutes.
eng.perks/feeding_frenzy/description: Palla and Grass Seed drop at double the usual amount from Cutting Grass.
eng.perks/forager/description: Chopping down a Tree will occasionally drop a seasonally appropriate Forageable.
eng.perks/former_farmers/description: A dig site will now appear daily on your farm, with a new artifact set to collect.
eng.perks/fortified_blacksmithing/descriptio: Crafting Armadura will occasionally result in a bonus Fortified Infusion, which grants you an additional +4 HP when worn.
eng.perks/frenzy/description: Catching a fish will occasionally cause a fish school to spawn nearby.
eng.perks/full_class/description: Fish schools will all contain an additional Fish.
eng.perks/gemini_season/description: Animals gain the ability to occasionally give birth to twins as long as there is enough room in the mother's coop/barn.
eng.perks/generous_in_defeat/description: Monsters will occasionally drop twice as many items when defeated.
eng.perks/gift_exchange/description: When you throw an item into a resting Mimic Chest, it will drop two items instead of one.
eng.perks/gold_expert/description: The amount of Gold Ore required to craft Gold Lingots will be reduced by 1.
eng.perks/good_as_gold/description: Breaking a Gold Node will occasionally drop an extra piece of Gold.
eng.perks/green_thumb/description: Planting a Seed will sometimes also Water the soil of the targeted tile.
eng.perks/guardians_shield_two/description: Your Shield will now activate randomly at low chance.
eng.perks/guardians_shield/description: Once per day, the first hit you take is reflected.
eng.perks/hammer_timing_three/description: The Craft Time for all crafting recipes will reduce by an additional 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 30 minutes.
eng.perks/hammer_timing_two/description: The Craft Time for all crafting recipes will reduce by an additional 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 20 minutes.
eng.perks/hammer_timing/description: The Craft Time for all crafting recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes.
eng.perks/harvest_horse/description: When your Mistmare runs over a forage spot or a fully grown crop, it will pop from the ground.
eng.perks/harvest_time/description: Slow-Growing crops now reach their first-time harvest a day earlier.
eng.perks/hasty_blacksmithing/description: Crafting Armadura will occasionally result in a bonus Hasty Infusion, which grants you an additional 4% Speed Boost when worn.
eng.perks/heavy_duty/description: Tilling soil will sometimes drop a piece of Stone or Wood.
eng.perks/in_motion/description: Defeating a Monster will sometimes grant a brief Speed Boost.
eng.perks/iron_expert/description: The amount of Iron Ore required to craft Iron Lingots will be reduced by 1.
eng.perks/iron_hound/description: Breaking an Node de Ferro will occasionally drop an extra piece of Iron.
eng.perks/jump_attack/description: Jumping and then Attacking mid-air will damage enemies in a small radius.
eng.perks/leech_blacksmithing/description: Crafting a Weapon will occasionally result in a bonus Leech Infusion, which restores 1 HP each time it's used to attack a Monster.
eng.perks/legendary/description: Legendary fish can now appear when the season and weather conditions are right.
eng.perks/lightweight_blacksmithing/descript: Crafting a Tool will occasionally result in a bonus Lightweight Infusion, occasionally dropping Stamina orbs on use.
eng.perks/likable_cooking/description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Likable Infusion, turning the item into a Universally Liked gift.
eng.perks/living_off_the_land/description: Harvesting a crop will occasionally drop a cooked dish that uses the crop.
eng.perks/lost_to_history/description: Ritual Chamber Floors will sometimes appear in the Mines.
eng.perks/loveable_cooking/description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Lovable Infusion, turning the item into a Universally Loved gift.
eng.perks/lucky_haul_two/description: Catching a fish is even more likely to drop double the amount of the fish.
eng.perks/lucky_haul/description: Catching a fish will sometimes drop double the amount.
eng.perks/lumberjack_two/description: Breaking a Branch, felling a tree, or chopping down a stump will always drop an extra piece of Wood.
eng.perks/lumberjack/description: Breaking a Branch will sometimes drop an extra piece of Wood.
eng.perks/magic_design/description: Pedres d'Essència are now craftable, and can power a statue for 40 days. Gegant
eng.perks/magical_meals/description: Cooking a Four star dish and above will occasionally result in a bonus Mana Infusion, which restores a mana orb when consumed.
eng.perks/masonry/description: Breaking a Rock will sometimes drop an extra piece of Stone.
eng.perks/material_world/description: Material drops from breakables in the Mines now drop twice as much.
eng.perks/maximum_milling/description: Crafting Farratges at el molí will sometimes drop an additional item of the same kind.
eng.perks/mine_time/description: Movement Speed will increase for 10 seconds when you first enter a new Floor.
eng.perks/mist_sight/description: A Mist Spot will appear daily around Mistria where the veil between worlds is thin, allowing you to reach through and pull forth unusual objects from the magic realm in exchange for essence.
eng.perks/museum_quality_one/description: Digging up Uncommon Artifacts will become more likely.
eng.perks/museum_quality_three/description: Digging up Legendary Artifacts will become more likely.
eng.perks/museum_quality_two/description: Digging up Rare Artifacts will become more likely.
eng.perks/natural_beauty_two/description: Biome Furniture Recipes are now more likely to drop from Dig Sites in the Mines.
eng.perks/natural_beauty/description: Biome Furniture Recipes will sometimes drop from Dig Sites in the Mines.
eng.perks/natural/description: Chopping down any tree will occasionally drop Hardwood.
eng.perks/nice_ride/description: The appearance of large animals can now be unlocked at 5 Hearts to ride them.
eng.perks/nice_swing/description: Grants a chance that tilling refunds the stamina it uses.
eng.perks/ore_riginal/description: Biome-Specific Ore will sometimes drop from Breaking Rocks in the Mines.
eng.perks/ornamental/description: Harvesting a crop or forageable will sometimes drop a recipe teaching you how to make an ornamental furniture version of the plant.
eng.perks/out_of_juice/description: Enchanterns now briefly freeze in place after discharging.
eng.perks/perfect_catch/description: Uncommon and rare fish will become more common.
eng.perks/perfect_pollinators/description: Legendary bugs will now appear more often.
eng.perks/perfect_prefix/description: The infusion power of Infused Weapons will double.
eng.perks/playtime_one/description: New animal toys are now sold at Hayden's Shop.
eng.perks/prepared_picker/description: Harvesting a Forageable will occasionally drop a Seed version, if it can be grown.
eng.perks/prize_winning/description: Harvesting crops will occasionally drop coins based on 5% of their selling price.
eng.perks/pursuit/description: Digging up Peat, Sod, or Clay increases your chances of finding an Uncommon or Rare Artifact the next time.
eng.perks/quality_crafting/description: Crafting an Item will occasionally result in a bonus Quality Infusion, which grants it a 10% higher selling price.
eng.perks/quick_footed/description: Blau Sapling pools will grant a short Speed Boost rather than slow you down.
eng.perks/reclaimer/description: Biome-Specific Furniture will sometimes drop from Treasure Chests in the Mines.
eng.perks/refined_rockery/description: The Craft Time for all Refineria de Pedra recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes.
eng.perks/refreshing/description: Watering a crop will sometimes refund the Stamina used.
eng.perks/resonance/description: Defeating an enemy can break a nearby rock.
eng.perks/restorative_cooking/description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Restorative Infusion, which grants an HP & Stamina Regen buff when consumed.
eng.perks/rocking/description: Clod Projectiles that are reflected back are now much more likely to critically strike.
eng.perks/school_crasher/description: Swimming into a Fish School will drop half its contained items without spending Stamina.
eng.perks/seasoned/description: Finding Uncommon or rarer Forageables will become more likely.
eng.perks/set_pieces/description: Crafting an item can occasionally give you two of it.
eng.perks/sharp_blacksmithing/description: Crafting a Weapon will occasionally result in a bonus Sharp Infusion, which grants it an additional +1 Poder d'Atac.
eng.perks/shrine_savant/description: Using an Offering Shrine will bestow a short HP & Stamina Regen buff in addition to their usual effect.
eng.perks/sickle_sword/description: You can now use your Espasa to harvest crops quickly.
eng.perks/silver_expert/description: The amount of Silver Ore required to craft Silver Lingots will be reduced by 1.
eng.perks/silver_seeker/description: Breaking a Silver Node will occasionally drop an extra piece of Silver.
eng.perks/snacktime/description: The time it takes to eat has been reduced by half.
eng.perks/sonic_boom/description: If you attack the Essence Bat's sonic attack, unleash a Sonic Boom, damaging all enemies around you.
eng.perks/speedy_cooking/description: Cooking a dish will occasionally result in a bonus Speedy Infusion, which grants a Speed Boost buff when consumed.
eng.perks/steady_supplies/description: Sod, Peat, and Cattails can now be purchased at the Carpenter's Shop.
eng.perks/stoneturner/description: Artifacts will sometimes drop from breaking Rocks in the Mines.
eng.perks/sunken_secrets/description: Dive spots can now contain Sunken Artifacts.
eng.perks/sunken_treasure/description: Treasure chests are more likely to appear when diving.
eng.perks/superb_sower/description: You can now charge your seeds to spread them across a wider area.
eng.perks/taste_maker/description: Cooking Recipes will sometimes drop from Treasure Chests in the Mines.
eng.perks/the_bell_tolls/description: You will receive the Campana Gran crafting recipe. When rung, the Campana Gran calls out or sends in all animals into their buildings.
eng.perks/time_sensitive_four/description: The Craft Time for all blacksmithing recipes will reduce by yet another 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 40 minutes.
eng.perks/time_sensitive_three/description: The Craft Time for all blacksmithing recipes will reduce by another 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 30 minutes.
eng.perks/time_sensitive_two/description: The Craft Time for all blacksmithing recipes will reduce by an additional 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 20 minutes.
eng.perks/time_sensitive/description: The Craft Time for all blacksmithing recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes.
eng.perks/time_to_eat_three/description: The Cook Time for all cooking recipes will be reduced by another 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 30 minutes.
eng.perks/time_to_eat_two/description: The Cook Time for all cooking recipes will be reduced by an additional 10 minutes, bringing the total reduction to 20 minutes.
eng.perks/time_to_eat/description: The Cook Time for all cooking recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes.
eng.perks/tireless_blacksmithing/description: Crafting Armadura will occasionally result in a bonus Tireless Infusion, which grants you an additional +4 Stamina when worn.
eng.perks/treasure_hunter/description: Treasure Floors will sometimes appear in the Mines.
eng.perks/treasure_trove/description: You can no longer catch Wooden Capsa del Tresores, and you are now more likely to catch a higher tier of Capsa del Tresor.
eng.perks/treasured/description: Treasure Chests will become more likely to appear in the Mines.
eng.perks/true_blue/description: Breaking a Sapphire Node will occasionally drop an extra Sapphire.
eng.perks/true_strike_two/description: Your Attacks are more likely to become Critical, doing double damage in the Mines.
