eng.perks/true_strike/description: Your Attacks will occasionally become Critical, doing double damage in the Mines.
eng.perks/underground_inspiration/descriptio: Coral and Crystals now drop materials twice as often.
eng.perks/unexpected_haul/description: Capsa del Tresores will become more likely to appear when Fishing.
eng.perks/unpeatable/description: Digging up Peat, Sod, and Clay will sometimes drop double the usual amount.
eng.perks/waste_not_want_not/description: Cooking a dish will occasionally return one of its ingredients afterward.
eng.perks/weedline_watcher_two/description: up Junk will become even less likely. de Pesca
eng.perks/weedline_watcher/description: up Junk will become less likely. de Pesca
eng.perks/welcome_home_two/description: Newly bought or born animals will start at 2 Heart Level.
eng.perks/welcome_home/description: Newly bought or born animals will start at 1 Heart Level.
eng.perks/well_armed/description: Biome-unique Armadura and Weapons will sometimes drop from Treasure Chests in the Mines.
eng.perks/well_placed/description: Out of Place Artifacts will sometimes drop from Dig Sites in the overworld.
eng.perks/well_watered/description: Watered crops will occasionally retain their water through the next day.
eng.perks/western_ruins_scholar/description: An additional Dig Site will appear daily at les Ruines de l'Oest.
eng.perks/what_a_catch/description: Fish have a chance of dropping coins worth 10% of their value when caught.
eng.perks/wind_down/description: El Molí Time for all mill recipes will be reduced by 10 minutes.
eng.perks/working_with_the_grain_two/descrip: Crafting an item is now even more likely to return one of its ingredients afterward.
eng.perks/working_with_the_grain/description: Crafting an item will occasionally return one of its ingredients afterward.
eng.player_assets/hair_medium_half_bun_fring: Half Bun Fringe de Tamany Mitjà
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_animal: The Crown has requested an additional supply of feathers and wool to help make bedding and blankets for those in need.
Ship 10 feathers and 10 wool of any kind, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_archae: The Capital Museu has requested local artifact shards from all around Aldaria as it conducts a research project.
Ship 15 Shards and 5 Shard Masses, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_baked_: The Crown has put out a request for hearty main dishes to be shipped out to villages in the Western Mountains of Aldaria, to help offset a poor harvest in the region.
Ship 5 Baked Main Dishes of any kind, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_bell_b: The Crown believes it is important to assess the emerging specialities of its towns for export potential, and Bell Berries are one of Mistria's.
Ship 20 Bell Berries, then report to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_berrie:
The Capital Market has put out a request for fresh berries. They're always in high demand!

I know it doesn't seem like much, but shipping out some berries would be a big help.
Ship 30 berries of any kind, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_copper:
An increase in the number of farms being established across rural Aldaria has meant that copper tools are in high demand.

Shipping some out would help support these newer farms.
Ship any 5 Copper Tools, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_crops/: Not every place in Aldaria is as bountiful as Mistria, and fresh crops would go a long way to help out areas that are still struggling to recover after the earthquake.
Ship 30 crops of any kind, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_fish/d: Bad weather up the coast has kept fishing boats from sailing out. Shipments of fish would go a long way to help until the storms clear up.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_fish/s: Ship 40 fish of any kind, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_flower:
Princess Delaphine has heard that there are no finer flowers in Aldaria than in Mistria!

This is a special request to help supply the floral arrangements for her birthday celebration.
Ship any 30 Flowers, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_gold_i: The Crown is searching for new sources of gold within Aldaria.
Ship 10 Gold Lingots, then report to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_golden:
There's no better way to show foreign dignitaries that Aldaria is back on its feet than to give them a meal made with all Aldarian ingredients!

But to do that, chefs in the Capital will need the very best.
Ship 5 Golden Cheese and 5 Golden Mayonnaise of any kind, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_grass_: Grass Starters are needed to help combat topsoil erosion along the edge of the badlands.
Ship 10 Grass Starters, then report to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_ingots:
Quality metal Lingots are vital for work all over Aldaria, but supply simply hasn't kept up with demand.

Shipping ingots would help projects that have stalled out.
Ship 10 Iron Lingots and 5 Silver Ingots, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_mine_f: The Royal Physician is requesting rare and unusual underground materials to see if any would be useful to his work.
Ship 30 forageables from the mines, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_monste:
Linsberry Island has been reporting the appearance of unusually aggressive wildlife that the Capital has no previous record of.

They're issuing a call to see if anyone has physical examples of something similar in the kingdom.
Ship any 30 Monster Drops, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_refine: Shipments of Pedra Refinada from Mistria would help to provide high quality materials for various building projects across the kingdom.
Ship 20 Pedra Refinada, then report to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_soup/d: The Capital's soup kitchen has requested regional soups to help replenish its larder.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_soup/s: Ship 15 soups of any kind, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_stone_: Repairs and upgrades to the roads of Aldaria is an ongoing task. Additional paving materials would help to speed up the work!
Ship any 100 Stone Paths, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_stone/:
An old stone retaining wall recently collapsed along a well traveled road in the northeast.

The surveyors want to build it back even better, so as much stone as can be spared is requested.
Ship 250 stone, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/crown_quests/crown_request_tables:
The Capital is constructing a brand new orphanage, but has run into issues with not having enough woodworkers available.

Help supply new furniture so the children can be moved into their new home as quickly as possible.
Ship 6 Dining Tables and 12 Dining Chairs of any kind, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_a_miners:
When the earthquake hit, we lost a lot of our gear in the mines.

I found my Pic, but Errol never found his. I'd love to return it to him!
Bring a Miner's Pic to Olric.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_a_red_to: I require a Vermell toadstool for something I'm working on. I will not be elaborating.
Bring a Vermell toadstool to Juniper.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_a_rock/d: Hi, can someone bring me a cool rock? I'm collecting them! I'll give you a nice chair in exchange.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_a_rock/s: Bring a piece of stone to Olric.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_acorn/de: Celine read me a story about a princess befriending woodland creatures with a song. I can't sing, but I bet I could bribe them! Can I get some Acorns to help build my woodland army?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_apple/de: Mistria's apples are second to none, I'd like to request one freshly picked from the tree.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_armored_: Terithia told me a legend of an Armaduraed Bass, a fish that grows its own armor. Willing to pay well to see if it really exists.
Bring an Armaduraed Bass to March.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_bait/des: I could use a little extra help getting the fish to bite. Can someone bring me a worm?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_baked_po:
I have a theory I'd like to test, but I need some help!

Can someone bring me a baked Patata? I think I can improve the recipe!
Bring a baked Patata to Hayden.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_basil_th:
Would someone please bring me some herbs?

I'm planning to make some herb salad but I'm a little short on ingredients.
Bring some alfàbrega and Timó to Valen.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_beet_sou: If there was someone... who had made an exceptional Beet Soup, and was so inclined to make more... I'd be willing to pay handsomely.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_beet/des:
Winter's here and that means Beets!

I'd like to request the freshest, most mouthwatering Beet you can find!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_bell_ber: Could someone whip me up a Bell Berry Bakewell Tart, now that els Deep Woods are opened back up?
Request for Bell Berry Bakewell Tart
Bring a Bell Berry Bakewell Tart to Holt.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_berries_: If someone would be so kind as to bring me some wild berries for my snack, I would be in your debt.
Bring some wild berries to Errol.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_berries/:
I'm craving something sweet!

If you bring me some wild berries, I'll teach you how to make berries and cream!
Bring some wild berries to Eiland.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_bird_hou: I woke up to birdsong yesterday morning and quite enjoyed it. I'd like to request a Birdhouse to hopefully attract some new bird friends to my Clínica.
Bring a Bird House to Valen.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_blackber:
Could someone drop off some blackberries, please?

I just love blackberry jam but I'm nearly out. If you can bring me some, I'll teach you how to make your own!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_blueberr:
It's blueberry season, so I want to make some blueberry jam!

If you can bring me some, I'll share my recipe!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_breath_o: I'm looking for a unique gift for Celine. I know it's a longshot, but can someone help me find a Breath Of Flame flower?
Bring a Breath of Flame to Nora.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_bristles: You won't find a more comfortable stuffing for a chair than Capybara Bristles, which is why I require some.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_broccoli:
Can I request some fresh broccoli?

There's a tough recipe I want to try out...
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_bull_hor:
I've got some crafting orders that need Bull Banyes to finish, but they're in short supply.

Can you help?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_burdock_:
It's burdock root season!

Could someone bring me one?
Bring a Burdock Root to Nora.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_butter/d: Any Chef will tell you that the one thing they can never have enough of is Butter! I'd like to request some.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_cabbage/: I'm requesting a fresh snacking Cabbage!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_carrot/d: Dozy quite enjoys a raw Carrot as a treat, and I'd like for him to have the very best. Gather me a few, or, uh grow them? I'm not sure.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_caterpil:
Luc's been asking me to get a friend for his caterpillar but I'm not sure where to get one.

Can someone bring me one? I'll repay you with a bite to eat!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_catfish/: I need a Peix Gat for a dish we're making at La taverna! If you bring me one, I'll teach you my recipe!
Bring a Peix Gat to Hemlock.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_cauliflo: Looking for the freshest, most delicious Cauliflower in Mistria!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_cheese/d: Mom says I can't eat a big chunk of Cheese as a meal, but I can't think of any scientific reason why not. Could I request some Cheese, for science?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_chestnut:
URGENT: I need some Castanyes!

Please bring me some as soon as possible! I'll trade you an apple!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_chili_pe: Seems to me I'm always running out of Pebrot Xilis! I'd like to request a few.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_clam/des:
Years ago Terithia showed me how to make the most delectable Cloïssa Chowder, but I'm too old to be diving for the Clam I need off the coast.

Help a fellow out?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_clay/des:
I need to get my hands on some clay so that Dell can finish her "art project".

Apparently she needs it to make a legendary Espasa?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_coconuts: Terithia told me that Mistria has Cocos at la platja, but I haven't had the time to get out there myself. Could I request 3 Coconuts?

Would someone bring me some Cocos from la platja?

This weather calls for a nice cold drink. Bring me some and I'll fix us up some coconut milk!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_cod/desc:
Anyone in the mood for a little ocean fishing?

I'm looking for a Cod, and I've got a recipe to share if you do!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_copper_b: I've heard there's an amazing beetle found in the Mines... Please, I must have it for my collection! I'll trade for it!
Bring a copper nugget beetle to Luc.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_copper_i:
A trading partner wants to see the quality of the new copper coming out of the Mines.

Could I get a Copper Lingot?
Bring a Copper Lingot to Balor.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_copper_s:
I've saved up for a new Pala de Coure, but the Blacksmith's is so busy, I don't want to trouble them.

Could someone help me out?
Request for a Pala de Coure
Bring a Pala de Coure to Celine.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_copper/d: I need some copper ore and I need it soon. If you can manage it, I'll pay you for it.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_copper/s: Bring some copper ore to March.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_coral/de:
I've read that ground up Coral can be good for growing certain types of plants.

Can someone bring me some?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_corn/des: Grilled Corn is a regular side at our dinner table, but I don't want to dip into our shop's stock. I'd like to request 4 ears of corn.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_cranberr:
Would someone mind bringing me some cranberries?

This chilly weather has me craving a taste of home.

If you can bring me some, I'll share my recipe for Nabiu taronja scones!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_crocus/d: Could someone get me a Crocus? Please?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_crystal_: I've heard of something called "Crystal Berries" that grow in Mistria, but I haven't been able to find any! Can I request some? I'd love to see what I can bake with them!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_crystal/:
Rumor has it that crystals of marvelous quality can be found below the mines.

I would be willing to pay top tesserae for some.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_cucumber: One of the joys of summer is fresh Cogombres. Could I request a few?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_daikon/d:
As the name suggests, Winter Stew is just the thing for a frosty day in Mistria!

Bring me a Rave Daikon and I'll share my recipe with you.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_daikon/s: Bring a Rave Daikon to Vera.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_deep_ear:
Luc wants to see a bug he's never seen before!

Can you help me be a cool big sister and find an insect from deep in the mines?
Bring a Deep Earthworm to Reina.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_diamond/: Diamonds have a lot of industrial uses, but I just like'em cause they're shiny! Hard to find though, could someone bring me one?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_dill/des: Could I request some Fonoll? Can't make good Pastís de Cranc without it!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_dragon_h: Have you ever heard of the Dragon Horn Beetle? I have! But I haven't been able to find one in els Deep Woods yet. Please help!
Bring a Dragon Horn Beetle to Luc.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_duck_egg: Dozy likes a ànec egg in his food every now and then, bring one to me.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_earthshr:
Don't know if it's found around these parts, but I'm looking for an Earthshroom.

I got a recipe to exchange for it that'll make it worth the hunt!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_eel/desc: I need a anguila d'aigua dolça. Bring one to me if you want to know how to make a grilled eel rice bowl.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_eel/stag: Bring a anguila d'aigua dolça to March.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_egg/desc:
Errol suggested that more protein in my diet could help with my excavation work.

May I request three eggs?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_emerald/:
The mines were once famous for the quality of their emeralds.

If you happen to find any, I'd pay handsomely.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_emeralds: Legend says that Mistria was once famous for its Emeralds. I'd like to request seven of them, for completely legitimate reasons.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_fennel/d:
Can you bring me some fennel if you find any growing east of town?

I'll teach you how to make a spring salad in return!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_fiddlehe: A friend of mine says that Mistrian Fiddleheads are the best around, and asked if I could gather one for her. But I don't even know what they look like. Little help?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_fog_orch:
Eiland claims he saw a "mystical, ethereal flower that seemed out of a bygone era" at les Ruines de l'Oest.

I've got better things to do then hunt for it, but if you find it, bring it to me.
Bring a Fog Orchid to Juniper.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_freshwat: Did you know that pearls come from oysters? I didn't! I can't afford a pearl, but I can request a Ostra d'Aigua Dolça!
Request for a Ostra d'Aigua Dolça
Bring a Ostra d'Aigua Dolça to Maple.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_frog/des:
Every fantasy story I read has a talking Granota in it! There's too many in el Camí de l'Est's pond for me to check them all.

Help me start my big adventure!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_gardenin:
Would someone bring me some sod and peat for a potting soil mix I'm testing?

I'll share some fresh flowers from my Jardí in return!
Request for Cuidar del Jardí Materials
Bring some sod and peat to Celine.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_garlic/d:
Could someone please bring me some All?

Since garlic is in season, I'd love to make a batch of garlic bread. If you can bring me some, I'll share my recipe!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_glass/de:
It was hard enough to get glass before the earthquake, now it's near impossible!

I'll pay good money to whoever can find us some.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_glowberr: Looking for someone to gather Glowberries for me, I'd like to make some cookies.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_goby/des: Can I get someone to fish me up a Goby? They're good luck!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_gold_ing: The Needy Children of Aldaria are doing their annual fundraising mission for Gold Lingots. Please, help the Needy Children.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_gold_ore: I have it on good authority that the Mine is producing Gold Ore again. I'm paying handsomely to have some of that ore come directly to me.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_golden_b: A Capital merchant with a high opinion of himself recently told me I couldn't expect something like Golden Butter out of Mistria. I'll pay handsomely to prove him wrong.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_golden_c: I've heard tell of a cookie, a GOLDEN cookie. Just thinking about them is making me hungry! Someone bake me Golden Cookies posthaste!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_grilled_: A few ears of Grilled Corn would be a perfect summer side dish. Could someone grill them up for me?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_hay/desc: I'd like to give my vaques a little extra hay for being so good. I can swap it for some of their milk!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_haybale/: Can I request a Hay Bale? They've got a lot of design potential!
Bring a Hay Bale to Merri.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_heather/:
This time of year always makes me think of my mother's favorite flower, Bruc.

Could someone gather a few bunches for me?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_holly/de: Could I request a few sprigs of Holly to decorate my booth with?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_horse_ha: I could use some horse hair for my reupholstery work, please and thank you.
Bring 3 Horse Hair bundles to Merri.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_horserad:
It's Salmó season again, and I'm craving some horseradish salmon!

If someone can bring me some key ingredients, I'll share my recipe!
Bring some Salmó and horseradish to Terithia
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_ice/desc:
You'd be amazed at how much ice we need to stock up on to keep our drinks cold and our food fresh!

Would you mind helping out?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_iron_arm:
Armadura styles have changed greatly throughout Aldaria's history.

I would like to request Iron Armor crafted in the modern style for my research.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_iron_ing:
Let's see how your blacksmithing is coming along, bring me an Iron Lingot.

Yes, [Ari]. I'm talking to you.
Bring an Iron Lingot to March.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_iron/des:
Mister March said if I could bring him iron, he'd make me a Espasa!

I've been saving my allowance for forever to post this!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_lake_tro: Can someone fish me up a Truita de Llac from els Deep Woods?
Bring a Truita de Llac to Holt.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_lemon/de:
I was planning to make some tea with Llimona, but I'm short on lemons!

If you have an extra one, can you bring it to me? I'll teach you my recipe!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_material: I'm slightly short on materials for a project. Can anyone spare some wood and stone? I can pay, of course!
Bring some wood and stone to Ryis.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_middlemi: I've heard rumors of Mistria's rarest flower, the Middlemist. Can anyone find one for me?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_milk/des:
I've been experimenting with ice cream recently, and that takes a lot of milk!

Bring me some and I'll let you try out one of my recipes!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_monster_: Seeking a Monster Core to help settle an academic debate.
Bring a Monster Core to Juniper.
A customer of mine wants something unusual and daring to offset his new outfit. I'd like to request a Monster Fang to help in my design.
Bring a Monster Fang to Louis.
Now, I love to whittle, but I've been thinking of expanding out into other materials. Could I request a Monster Horn to practice on?
Bring a Monster Horn to Holt.

I've recently seen a curious new item called "monster powder" on the market.

I would like to investigate its uses. Bring some to me.
Bring some monster powder to Juniper.

I want to try forging something with these "monster shells" I've been seeing around.

I don't care to know where they come from, just bring me some.
Bring some monster shells to March.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_moon_fru:
Has anyone seen any Fruita Lunar? They're quite hard to come by, but can be foraged around Mistria this time of year.

Please bring me one and I'll share a wonderful recipe for them!
Bring a Fruita Lunar to Eiland.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_moon/des:
I had no idea Mistria was so far out in the country that I'd need to bake my own Fruita Lunar Cake.

Luckily Dozy has chef training. Would someone bring me a Moon Fruit?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_moon/nam: Important Request for a Fruita Lunar
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_moon/sta: Bring a Fruita Lunar to Juniper.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_more_wil:
I'm working on a pie recipe, but I need some fresh wild berries.

If you bring me some I'll teach it to you!
Bring some wild berries to Reina.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_morel_mu:
I would like to source a morel mushroom, as it's known to have anti-inflammatory properties.

Please deliver one if possible.
Bring a morel mushroom to Valen.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_mullet/d:
Miss Terithia told me there's a fish called a Mullet, and I don't believe it!

I'd cough up my favorite snack if someone proves me wrong!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_night_qu: Requesting a Reina Nocturna flower. I need one for my work, but apparently they're quite rare, so I'm prepared to pay well.
Bring a Reina Nocturna to Juniper.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_noodles/: Maple keeps asking for Noodles, but then tells me "not these Noodles, the other ones!" I'm at my wit's end, can someone bring me a plateful to try to appease my little princess?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_obsidian: Olric told me that Obsidian is cooled down lava! I want one! Someone get me one!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_onion/de:
I'm making my favorite Ceba Soup, but I seem to be short on the most important ingredient.

Could someone bring me an Onion?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_orange/d:
Would someone be a dear and fetch me an Orange? I need to make a fresh batch of my famous Marmalade.

I'd be happy to reveal the recipe to you in exchange.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_oyster_m: March never really liked Oyster Mushrooms when he was little, but maybe now that he's older he'll like them! Could someone find some for me?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_peaches/: I've always enjoyed Préssecs, and I thought it'd be fun to request some to experiment with in my drinks!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pear/des: May I request a brace of Pears? They make an excellent snack.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_peas/des: Could I request some fresh Peas? Henrietta's a big fan!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_perch/de:
I'm quite fond of Perch Risotto, but lack the fish.

If anyone is fishing in the river on a rainy day, please keep an eye out for it and bring one to me for the recipe.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pike/des: Can I request a Pike? I hear fish is brain food, and I've never caught a Lluç de Riu so I figure they're pretty smart!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pike/nam: Request for a Lluç de Riu
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pike/sta: Bring a Lluç de Riu to Olric.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pineshro:
Would someone bring me some pineshrooms?

I'm really craving a nostalgic winter treat. If you don't mind bringing me some, I'll teach you how to make it!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pink_sca:
If I'm going to become queen someday, I need to get more comfortable giving orders...

Bring me a pretty seashell... please!
Bring a Rosa scallop shell to Maple.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pomegran: Can I request a glass of Magrana Juice? There's nothing more refreshing!
I've really been craving a Magrana for some reason. Could anyone help me out?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pond_ska:
Mom says I can't keep trying to catch a Pond Skater, cause I keep falling into the water when I miss!

Can someone help me catch one?
Bring a Pond Skater to Luc.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_potted_p: Hard to keep plants around La taverna, since Luc keeps making them into his bug's habitats. Can I request a Planta en Torreta so he can have a designated place for them?
Request for a Planta en Torreta
Bring a Planta en Torreta to Hemlock.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pudding/: I recently read a treatise on Puddings, and now I can't stop thinking about them. May I request one?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_pumpkin/: I'm quite fond of Carbassa Pie, and would like to request a Pumpkin for one!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_rabbit_w:
Rabbit Wool is essential for high quality garments, and one of my preferred materials to work in.

Please bring some to me!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_red_wine: You would think as a professional food judge I would have a dedicated sommelier, but no. I'd like to request a GOOD bottle of Vermell Wine.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_rice/des: When we have a really spicy dish I like to keep plenty of Rice on the table to help cut the heat for the kids. Can I request a couple of bags?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_riceball: I'd like to request a Riceball, I need something I can eat while working.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_roasted_:
This crisp weather has me in the mood for Roasted Castanyes!

Bring me some and I'll share my recipe with you.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_rooster_:
We could use some fresh Rooster Feathers to refill our guest pillows.

Could someone help us out?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_rose_hip:
I would like to request some fresh rose hips so I can make some seasonal jam.

They can be found fruiting on rose bushes when the weather gets cold.

If you can bring me some, I'll share my recipe for rose hip jam!
Bring some rose hips to Valen.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_rosemary: I think my Romaní might be getting a bit old, could someone bring me a fresh sprig now that it's back in season?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_roses/de: Could someone bring me a dozen Roses? I quite like the flower, but I'm not much of a fan of the actual picking, too many thorns.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_round_ro:
I once saw an incredibly round rock in the mines, but it rolled out of sight before I could grab it!

If you see it, could you bring it to me?
Request for a Really Round Rock
Bring a Really Round Rock to Olric.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_ruby/des:
I realize this is a big ask, but I have a customer who's willing to pay well for a ruby.

If you can get your hands on one, we can split the profits.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_salmon/d: If it's not too much trouble, could someone bring me some fresh salmon? Our last shipment was a little short.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_salted_w: Can anyone in Mistria make me a Salted Síndria? It's a perfect summer treat!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_sap/desc: I don't like dipping into the shop's supplies for personal projects. Can I request 5 Sap for my woodworking?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_sapphire:
A friend went out of the way to do me a favor and I'd like to show him how much I appreciated it.

Could you find me a Sapphire?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_scarecro: I'm afraid my patch of Jardí has become a breakfast spot to some very unruly birds. May I request a Espantaocells so my vegetables remain unharmed?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_seaweed/:
Would someone please deliver some Alga?

This hot weather calls for a nice chilled seaweed salad. If you can bring me some, I'll share my recipe!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_sesame/d:
One of my favorite herbs in Mistria is the Sesame!

Bring me some and I'll show you a great dish to make with it.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_shadow_f:
The Codex Mistria has some very interesting flowers it says are native to the region including a "Shadow Flower".

I'd like to have one to see how it grows!
Bring a Shadow Flower to Celine.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_shards/d:
I'm seeking some shards as part of my archaeological research. They can often be unearthed at dig sites!

If you come across any, could you bring me some?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_sheep_wo:
We're placing an order for new blankets for La taverna soon, and I think it'd make them extra special to be made of wool from Mistrian sheep.

I'll need half a dozen!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_shipping: Can I request a Contenidor de Venta? We're running out of room at the Blacksmith's.
Request for a Contenidor de Venta
Bring a Contenidor de Venta to March.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_silver_i:
A personal friend in the Capital, who happens to be a rather famous jeweler, has been complaining about the silver shortage.

Please bring me a bar so I can make a gift of it.
Bring a Silver Lingot to Elsie.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_silver_o:
The prices for importing silver into Mistria are outrageous.

Dig some up for me, I don't need much.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_silver_s:
My father, Baron Wiscar, has requested I send him something that he can give to the King.

I can't think of anything more suitable than a Espasa de Plata!
Request for a Espasa de Plata
Bring a Espasa de Plata to Adeline.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_singing_: Can someone help me catch a Singing Katydid? I want to put on a concert for all of my other bugs!
Bring a Singing Katydid to Luc.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_smallmou: My parents really like Mistrian Llobarro Boca-xica. Can I request a couple to send them?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_snail/de:
Mom said I shouldn't keep catching snails to bring home, but she didn't say I couldn't put up a request for one!

Please help, I just need one more to complete the whole set!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_snowdrop: If you wouldn't mind bringing me one of those lovely flowers that grows by les Ruines de l'Oest, I can provide you with seeds to grow more.
Request for a Anèmona Floc de Neu
Bring a Anèmona Floc de Neu to Elsie.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_spirit_m: Valen told me that Mistria has a tea I've never even heard of! Could I request a cup of Spirit Mushroom Tea, please?
Bring a Spirit Mushroom Tea to Darcy.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_spring_g: Sometimes the best chef in the world would like the best food in the world without having to prepare it himself. Bring me a Spring Galette, posthaste.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_strawber:
Would someone please bring me a Maduixa?

I'm happy to share my recipe for strawberries and cream in return!
Can someone bring me a Maduixa? I'll share my recipe for strawberry shortcake as a reward!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_striped_:
A fellow researcher has written to me with an unusual request for a Llobrarro Tigre from Mistria.

Could I prevail on someone to help me by catching one?
Bring a Llobrarro Tigre to Eiland.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_sugar_ca: You wouldn't believe how hard it is to get Canya de sucre in Mistria! Could I request one?
Bring 1 Canya de sucre to Holt.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_sunflowe: Sunflowers are so pretty, and they have so many seeds! I bet with just one I could make a whole FIELD of Gira-sols! Can I have one whole Sunflower, please?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_sweet_po: A Roasted Moniato is especially good when the weather starts to turn cold. Can I request a Sweet Patata?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_tea/desc:
My favorite tea has been in short supply for ages now.

Could I request some local tea instead?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_temple_f: Did you know the Princess of Aldaria is really into flowers? It'd be cool to have a flower to talk to her about. Help me find a Frangipani!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_thorn_vi: Could I request some Thorn Vine? Could be a good deterrent to keep pests out of my field!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_tideston: Dozy asked me to request someone bring him a "Tidestone", he thinks it'll be a real draw at the Banys Termals.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_tilapia/:
The Capital Museu has requested a Tilapia, but my skills do not lie in fishing.

There is a generous reimbursement if you can help.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_tomato_s: Could I get a bowl of Tomàquet Soup? I've had it at La taverna, I've had it at the Capital, I want to try everyone's take on it!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_tomato/d:
Would someone bring me some Tomàquetes?

I could really go for some nice cool gazpacho! I'll make enough for both of us!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_trail_mi:
I like to keep plenty of Trail Mix on hand for the kids, but they sure eat a lot of it! Can someone mix some more up for me? You'll need Wild Berries and Water Castanyes from els Estrets to make it!

Feel free to use the kitchen at La taverna.
Bring 3 portions of Trail Mix to Josephine.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_trout/de:
I'm craving some smoked Truita soup, but the fish aren't biting for me!

If you can bring me a trout I'll teach you my recipe!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_tuna_sas: I've got a craving for Tonyina Sashimi, but I just haven't had any luck with my catches! Can someone help out?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_turnip/d:
It's that time of year! I need to write a report on Mistria's spring crop yield.

Could you bring me a Nap to inspect?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_ultimate: A friend of a friend has a horse that needs to be in tiptop shape for a race. I've been asked to procure Ultimate Large Farratge. You'll be well compensated for assisting me.
Bring 1 Ultimate Large Farratge to Balor.
Henrietta was a big help with farm chores the other day and deserves a special treat. Could someone bring me a bag of Ultimate Small Farratge?
Bring 1 Ultimate Small Farratge to Hayden.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_undersea:
I like Alga fine in a cooked dish, but not too much by itself.

Maybe I just haven't tried the right kind. Bring me some I haven't tried before!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_walnut/d: I love working with regional ingredients, could I request 3 Walnuts?
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_water_ch:
I keep seeing folks enjoying Water Castanyes in all the ways but the best way- deep fried.

Bring me some and I'll enlighten you to the recipe.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_watermel: My horse Swiftwind is a big fan of Síndria, I'd like to request one as a treat for him.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_wild_ber:
There are many ways to use the Mistrian Wild Berry, but in my opinion there's no finer way than in a fresh scone!

Bring me some wild berries and let me share the recipe with you.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_wild_gra: Things around here are too busy to go foraging myself, so can someone please hunt down some Wild Grapes for me? Try els Estrets!
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_wild_lee:
Could someone bring me a wild leek? I'm a little short for my soup recipe.

I'll give you a bowl to take home in return!
Bring a wild leek to Reina.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_wood_fen:
Could someone craft some wood Tanca for me?

Henrietta's been testing the integrity of my current enclosure and it's simply not meeting her standards.
Bring some wood Tanca to Hayden.
eng.quests/fetch_quests/request_for_wood/des: Can someone bring me some wood to help us restock? I'll pay a fair price!
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_birdhouse/descript: Ryis says the tree is ready for a birdhouse and asked me to come over to build it. What color should we paint it?
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_birdhouse/stages/0: Meet Ryis at the Carpenter's Shop.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_change_of_greenery: Celine says the she can't get the sprout to grow any more and wants to brainstorm what to do. Is there something special it needs?
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_duet/description: Ryis said he spotted a Blau feather by the birdhouse. I should meet him at the Hawthorn tree for some bird watching!
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_duet/stages/0/obje: Meet Ryis at the Hawthorn tree.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_get_together/descr: Hayden asked me to come down to his house on Granja Aiguadolça for a get together.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_get_together/stage: Meet with Hayden at his house.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_little_while_longe: Hayden asked me to come over so that we could spend some time together. I wonder what food he's making...
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_lost_flower/descri: Celine asked me to join her for a picnic! She wants to meet at her cottage first.
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_rewarding_choice/d: Adeline asked me to meet her in her office. She wants my help with an important choice as "an average Mistrian".
eng.quests/heart_quests/a_sapling/descriptio: Ryis wants me to meet him in his room to talk about a new tree for the cottage ruins. One step closer to a new birdhouse!
eng.quests/heart_quests/an_open_book/descrip: Balor wants to give me advice on the items I'm shipping. I should go meet him in La taverna to hear him out.
eng.quests/heart_quests/an_outside_consultan: Valen is struggling with her research into the panacea and wants to get Juniper's help. This might be tricky...
Meet Valen at the Banys Termals.
eng.quests/heart_quests/batch_312/descriptio: Valen asked me to bring her one piece of peat for her research. I hope it's not for flavoring her medicine...
eng.quests/heart_quests/batch_312/stages/0/o: Bring Valen one piece of peat.
eng.quests/heart_quests/becoming_junipers_gu:
Come and get your free health tonic at Juniper's Banys Termals! 

Clears your pores, freshens your breath, and side effects are minimal. 

Available while supplies last.
Meet Juniper at the Banys Termals.
eng.quests/heart_quests/bird_song/descriptio: Landen asked me if I had any spare wood on the farm. He said to bring him 15 pieces for 150t!
eng.quests/heart_quests/chief_inspector/desc: Adeline asked me to come along for her next inspection of Mistria. We'll start from the Request Board.
eng.quests/heart_quests/chief_inspector/stag: Meet Adeline at the Request Board.
eng.quests/heart_quests/extra_feed/descripti: Hayden has some extra feed to give me and wants me to meet him at his farm. I wonder how Henrietta's doing...
eng.quests/heart_quests/farm_fresh_sous_chef: Reina says she has something important she needs to ask me. I wonder if she's heard more about the Cooking Competition...
eng.quests/heart_quests/for_good/description: Balor asked me to meet him in his room at the Menjar a la Taverna.
eng.quests/heart_quests/for_good/stages/0/ob: Meet Balor in his room at La taverna.
eng.quests/heart_quests/horsing_around/descr: Juniper wants to test another potion on me. I should go to the Banys Termals before she tests it on someone else.
eng.quests/heart_quests/horsing_around/stage: Meet Juniper in the Banys Termals.
eng.quests/heart_quests/lemonade_from_lemons: Balor asked me to join him for a meal at La taverna. Business must be good!
eng.quests/heart_quests/life_in_this_form/de: Caldarus asked me to join him at his temple for a meal. What could he want to speak about?
eng.quests/heart_quests/lost_track_of_time/d: Adeline asked me to join her for tea. I hope she takes the time to actually relax...
eng.quests/heart_quests/lost_track_of_time/s: Meet Adeline at the Casa Pairal.
eng.quests/heart_quests/many_hands_make_ligh: Olric asked me to come help him and March out with their work. March said my blacksmithing is improving but Olric wasn't supposed to tell me that...
eng.quests/heart_quests/pie_in_the_sky/descr: Reina asked me to meet her at La taverna to taste test a new dish.
eng.quests/heart_quests/pie_in_the_sky/stage: Meet Reina at the Taverna el Drac Dormilega.
eng.quests/heart_quests/potions_and_errands/: Juniper asked me to bring her a Breath of Flame flower for a new bath infusion. Another errand?
Bring Juniper a Breath of Flame flower.
eng.quests/heart_quests/real_fine_day/descri: Hayden says he has a day planned to help socialize Henrietta. Does the Supermercat let gallines inside...?
eng.quests/heart_quests/shield_of_the_realm/: March asked me in a short letter to stop by if I wanted part-time work. How loquacious...
Meet March at the Blacksmith Store.
eng.quests/heart_quests/shopping_buddy/descr: Reina asked me to join her in the Supermercat. She's on the hunt for ingredients to wow the judges of the cooking competition.
eng.quests/heart_quests/surprise_me/descript: March asked me to meet him at the Blacksmith's store but didn't say why.
eng.quests/heart_quests/surprise_me/stages/0: Meet March in his house by the forge.
eng.quests/heart_quests/tall_dark_and_myster: Seeking help to unload supplies for the relief effort, paying 200t. Come talk to me.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_aldarian_cooking: It's time! This is Reina's big moment in front of the judges for la Competició Culinària d'Aldarian.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_annual_check_up/:
It's time for YOUR free annual check-up! Yes you, the person reading this. 

Come to Clínica de la Valen today for a healthier you!
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_glade/descriptio: Eiland needs more time to find a lead on the Dragonsworn Armadura, but wants go for a walk in els Deep Woods. Maybe walking will clear his mind?
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_glade/stages/0/o: Meet Eiland in els Deep Woods.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_manor/descriptio: Eiland says that the search for the Dragonsworn Armadura has taken an unexpected turn. I should meet him at the manor.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_manor/stages/0/o: Meet Eiland at the Casa Pairal.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_panacea/descript: Valen asked me to meet her at les Ruines de l'Oest to search for the Cliffblossom. There are a lot of cliffs there, so hopefully it'll turn up...
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_panacea/stages/0: Meet Valen at les Ruines de l'Oest.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_ruins/descriptio: Eiland asked me to meet him at les Ruines de l'Oest to look for more clues and possibly more Dragonsworn Armadura.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_ruins/stages/0/o: Meet Eiland at les Ruines de l'Oest.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_smell_of_drying_: Adeline asked me to meet her in her office to get a better understanding of La tavernaer workings of the government.
Meet Adeline in her office within the casa pairal.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_stele/descriptio: Eiland asked me to meet him in front of the Casa Pairal so that he can show me an interesting site on the grounds.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_stele/stages/0/o: Meet Eiland outside the casa pairal.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_unusual_seed/des: Celine asked me to meet her in her cottage to help her with a flower.
eng.quests/heart_quests/the_unusual_seed/sta: Meet Celine at her cottage south of town.
eng.quests/heart_quests/water_and_soil/descr: Celine asked me to meet her at her cottage. The mystery seed hasn't sprouted yet and she wants my insight into what could possibly make this seed grow.
eng.quests/heart_quests/working_like_a_dog/d: Juniper asked me to come and help her with some "menial errands". How does Dozy put up with it...
eng.quests/heart_quests/working_like_a_dog/s: Meet Juniper in her room at the Banys Termals.
eng.quests/story_quests/breaking_the_fire_se: Juniper helped me translate the fire tablet. Now I need to offer the required items to break it.
eng.quests/story_quests/cop_some_ore/descrip:
My ore shipment is running late, and my lazy brother won't go into the "condemned, super creepy mine" for me, so someone else has to do it!

Bring me 3 pieces of copper ore! Or don't! Whatever!
eng.quests/story_quests/crafting_tutorial/de: Ryis asked me to meet him to review crafting.
eng.quests/story_quests/delivering_the_seali: Balor said he would deliver the Sealing Scroll to me tomorrow. For now, I just need to wait.
Wait for Balor to deliver the Sealing Scroll to you.
eng.quests/story_quests/do_a_bro_a_favor/des:
Welcome to town! 

Have you noticed that Mistria is full of rocks? I've got just the tool for dealing with them, and it's all yours if you can do me a favor! 

Come talk to me for the details!
eng.quests/story_quests/find_the_weathervane: Hayden asked me to find his weathervane that was blown away in the windstorm. He said it might be somewhere in els Estrets.
Find Hayden's weathervane in els Estrets and then bring it to him.
eng.quests/story_quests/friday_at_the_sleepi: Reina asked me to meet her after 6 pm at the Taverna el Drac Dormilega, for a Friday night gathering.
Friday at the Taverna el Drac Dormilega
Meet Reina at La taverna after 6 pm on a Friday.
eng.quests/story_quests/gossip_for_elsie/des: Do you have a nose for news? An ear for the exciting? I love Mistria, but I do miss all the gossip of the big city...
eng.quests/story_quests/gossip_for_elsie/sta: Talk to Balor, Juniper, and Dell to collect gossip. Afterwards, tell Elsie what you learned.
eng.quests/story_quests/greet_the_townsfolk/:
I'm sure you've met some of your neighbors already, but wouldn't it be nice to say hello to everyone?

Don't be shy, introduce yourself!
Introduce yourself to all the townsfolk and then talk to Adeline. Your map can help you locate everyone!
eng.quests/story_quests/greet_the_vendors/de: The Saturday Market is finally back! It's set up in the middle of town, around the big fountain. Visit all four vendors, and then report back to me!
eng.quests/story_quests/greet_the_vendors/st: Talk to Nora after you've introduced yourself to the vendors at the Saturday Market in town.
eng.quests/story_quests/jos_cooking_class/de:
On your own for the first time and unsure how to feed yourself? 

Come to the Taverna el Drac Dormilega for a free cooking class with Josephine! Learn the ins and outs of cooking!
eng.quests/story_quests/jos_cooking_class/st: Meet Josephine at the Taverna el Drac Dormilega.
eng.quests/story_quests/museum_donation_want: Errol sent me a letter telling me to meet him at the Museu west of town. He says he is the new curator and wants to talk to me about donations.
Meet Errol at the Museu in els Estrets.
eng.quests/story_quests/procuring_the_sealin: To break the next seal I will need four items, including a rare Sealing Scroll. Balor says he may be able to help me acquire one.
Wait for Balor to contact you with regards to the Sealing Scroll.
Deposit the required items into the chest next to Carro d'en Balor, then talk to Balor.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_haydens_barn/: Adeline asked me to meet her at Hayden's farm to work on a new project.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of Hayden's barn, then bring 4000 tesserae to Adeline.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_beach_bri: Terithia asked me to meet her and Adeline at la platja to work on a new project.
Meet Terithia and Adeline at la Platja.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box near Terithia's house, then bring 1000 tesserae to Terithia.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_bridge/de: Adeline requested my help in repairing the bridge on el Camí de l'Est.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_bridge/st: Meet Adeline near the bridge on el Camí de l'Est.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box next to the bridge, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_general_s: Adeline asked me to meet her at the Supermercat to talk about "Phase 2" of her plan to revitalize Mistria.
Go to the Supermercat to meet with Adeline.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of the outside the Supermercat, then bring Adeline 3000 tesserae.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_inn/descr: Adeline asked me to meet her at La taverna to talk about what's next for the town.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_inn/stage: Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of La taverna, then bring 6000 tesserae to Adeline.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_mill/desc:
Adeline sent me an official-looking letter asking to meet her in her office at the Casa Pairal.

Sounds like she wants my help restoring the old mill in town.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_mill/stag: Meet Adeline in her office within the casa pairal north of town.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of el Molí, then bring 1000 tesserae to Adeline.
eng.quests/story_quests/repair_the_summit_st: Adeline asked me to meet her in front of the Casa Pairal to talk about our next project.
Meet Adeline in front of the Casa Pairal.
eng.quests/story_quests/replenishing_mistria: Adeline asked me to meet her at the Casa Pairal to discuss Mistria's emergency supply reserves.
Go to the Casa Pairal to meet with Adeline.
Ship 10 crops and then speak to Adeline.
Adeline asked me to meet her at Hayden's farm to go over the plan for Mistria's food reserves.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of La taverna, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/story_quests/somethings_bugging_m:
I'm concerned that I never see anyone out catching bugs... I must do something about it! 

Do YOU want to catch bugs for FUN and SCIENCE? Come to La taverna and I'll help you get started!
eng.quests/story_quests/stinky_stamina_potio: Attractive and extremely talented Banys Termals owner seeks a gopher to find and hand over a Lilac.
eng.quests/story_quests/stone_refinery/descr: Adeline said she had some exciting news to share from the King's Council. Are we improving the mines somehow?
eng.quests/story_quests/stone_refinery/stage: Meet Adeline at the entrance to the Mines.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of the Mines, then bring 5000 tesserae to Adeline.
eng.quests/story_quests/tea_with_hayden/desc:
Can't thank you enough for your work on el molí, [Ari]!

If you've got some time, come on over to my place. I'll put on the kettle and we can chat about ranching and raising animals!
eng.quests/story_quests/tea_with_hayden/stag: Meet Hayden at his house west of your farm.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_animal_festival/: Today is el Festival dels Animals! I should head into town to enjoy the festivities.
Speak to Josephine once you are ready to start el Festival dels Animals judging.
Would you like to start the judging?
eng.quests/story_quests/the_earth_tablet/des: I found another tablet with strange markings in the Mines. I should bring it to Juniper to discuss our next steps.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_earth_tablet/sta: Speak to Juniper about the Earth Tablet.
Offer the required items to el segell de la terra.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_fire_tablet/desc: I found another tablet with strange markings in the Mines. I should bring it to Juniper to discuss our next steps.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_fire_tablet/stag: Speak to Juniper about the Fire Tablet.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_harvest_festival:
El Festival de la Collita is soon! Reina wants me to collect as many Queen Berries as I can which can be found in variety of places around Mistria.

The more I collect, the better the festival will be!
Collect Baia Reina before the upcoming festival.
Visit el Festival de la Collita in the town square.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_shooting_star_fe: Today is el Festival de l'Estel Fugaç! I should head over to el cim at 8pm to witness the gorgeous view. Elsie said that I should invite someone to go with me, as well.
Visit el Festival de l'Estel Fugaç at el Cim after 8pm.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_spring_festival/:
El Festival de Primavera is soon! Celine wants me to collect as much Alè de Primavera as I can which can be found in variety of places around Mistria.

The more I collect, the better the festival will be!
Collect Alè de Primavera before the upcoming festival.
Visit el Festival de Primavera in the town square.
eng.quests/story_quests/the_water_tablet/des:
I found a tablet with strange markings in the Mines. I'll need to figure out what it means before I can go any further.

Perhaps Eiland could help me translate it?
eng.quests/story_quests/the_water_tablet/sta: Speak to Eiland about the Water Tablet.
Offer the required items to el segell de l'aigua.
eng.quests/story_quests/unlocking_the_mines_: Eiland asked me to meet him at the Museu to discuss reopening the Mines.
Meet Eiland at the Museu west of town.

Errol has decided that we have improved the town enough to unlock the Mines!

Meet him and Eiland at the entrance of the Mines.
Meet Errol and Eiland outside the Entrada a la Mina.
eng.quests/story_quests/upgrade_the_carpente: Adeline sent me a letter asking me to meet her at the Carpenter's Shop to talk about the next town upgrade.
Meet Adeline at the Carpenter's Shop.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of the Carpenter's Shop, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/story_quests/upgrade_the_saturday: Adeline has some exciting news to share with me! I should go find her.
Deposit the required materials in the Donation Box outside of the Casa Pairal, then talk to Adeline.
eng.quests/tali_challenges/beet_soup_challen:
Our final cooking challenge dish is...

The legendary "Beet Soup"!
Turn in a Beet Soup to Taliferro.
eng.quests/tali_challenges/bell_berry_bakewe:
This week's cooking challenge dish is...

The new and trending "Bell Berry Bakewell Tart"!
Turn in a Bell Berry Bakewell Tart to Taliferro.
eng.quests/tali_challenges/chocolate_cake_ch:
Today's cooking challenge dish is...

The rich and decadent "xocolata Cake"!
Turn in a xocolata Cake to Taliferro.
eng.quests/tali_challenges/crispy_fried_eart:
This week's cooking challenge dish is...

The umami "Crispy Fried Earthshroom"!
Turn in a Crispy Fried Earthshroom to Taliferro.
eng.quests/tali_challenges/crystal_berry_pie:
This week's cooking challenge dish is...

The beautiful "Crystal Berry Pie"!
Turn in a Crystal Berry Pie to Taliferro.
eng.quests/tali_challenges/golden_cookies_ch:
This week's cooking challenge dish is...

The incredibly delicious "Golden Cookies"!
Turn in Golden Cookies to Taliferro.
eng.quests/tali_challenges/herb_salad_challe:
Today's cooking challenge dish is...

The delicate and refreshing "Herb Salad"!
Turn in an Herb Salad to Taliferro.
eng.quests/tali_challenges/incredibly_hot_po:
Today's cooking challenge dish is...

The unbelievably spicy "Incredibly Hot Pot"!
Turn in an Incredibly Hot Pot to Taliferro.
eng.quests/tali_challenges/omelet_challenge/:
Today's cooking challenge dish is...

The fluffy and cheese-filled "Omelet"!
Turn in an Omelet to Taliferro.
eng.quests/tali_challenges/rice_ball_challen:
Our first cooking challenge is...

The simple yet satisfying "Rice Ball"!
Turn in a Rice Ball to Taliferro.
eng.quests/tali_challenges/tide_salad_challe:
Today's cooking challenge dish is...

The crisp and healthy "Tide Salad"!
Turn in a Tide Salad to Taliferro.
eng.quests/tali_challenges/veggie_sub_sandwi:
This week's cooking challenge dish is...

The beloved "Veggie Sub Sandwich"!
Turn in a Veggie Sub Sandwich to Taliferro.
eng.ranching/animals/alpaca/core/new_baby_bo: Ha nascut una nova Alpaca! Posa-li nom
eng.ranching/animals/capybara/core/new_baby_: Ha nascut una nova Capibara! Posa-li nom
eng.ranching/animals/chicken/core/new_baby_b: Ha nascut una nova Gallina! Posa-li nom
eng.ranching/animals/cow/core/new_baby_born: Ha nascut una nova Vaca! Posa-li nom
eng.ranching/animals/cow/cosmetics/pink_sung: Ulleres de sol Roses per Vaques
eng.ranching/animals/duck/core/new_baby_born: Ha nascut nou Ànec! Posa-li nom
eng.ranching/animals/horse/core/new_baby_bor: Ha nascut un nou Cavall! Posa-li nom
eng.ranching/animals/rabbit/core/new_baby_bo: Ha nascut un nou Conill! Posa-li nom
eng.ranching/animals/sheep/core/new_baby_bor: Ha nascut una nova Ovella! Posa-li nom
eng.spells/fire_breath/description: Projecta un raig de foc. Pot destruir objectes i monstres. Dura un temps curt.
eng.spells/full_restore/description: Recupera tots els teus HP i Resistència quan el llances.
eng.spells/growth/description: Madura plenament els cultius en una àrea de 3x3 quan el llances. També pot progressar 1 estadi de qualsevol arbre.
eng.spells/summon_rain/description: Convoca breument un núvul de pluja que rega tots els teus cultius quan el llances.
eng.ui/crafting/woodcrafting/categories/0/su: Set de Granja per a Principiants
Set de Altar d'Urpes de Drac
eng.ui/tutorials/animal_sprite_statue/steps/: Posa una Estàtua d'Esperit Animal en un  in a Estable gran o Galliner, i els animals que hi visquin seran amanyagats automàticament a diari.
Per a que funcionin, cal carregar les Estàtues d'Esperit Animals amb una Pedra d'Essència.
Com més gran sigui la Pedra d'Essència, més dies romandrà carregada l'Estàtua.
Pots crear Pedres d'Essència un cop desbloquegis la Refineria de Pedra.
També pots trobar Pedres d'Essència en alguns cofres de la Mina!
eng.ui/tutorials/blacksmithing/steps/0/text:
Pas #1:
Interactua amb l'enclusa per a 
obrir el menú de ferreria.
eng.ui/tutorials/blacksmithing/steps/1/text:
Pas #2:
Tria que vols crear 
a la part esquerra del menú.
eng.ui/tutorials/blacksmithing/steps/2/text:
Pas #3:
Els materials, nivell d'habilitat,
i temps requerits són a la dreta.
eng.ui/tutorials/blacksmithing/steps/4/text: Si desbloqueges avantatges d'habilitat, pots crear ítems infusionats amb atributs especials!
eng.ui/tutorials/cooking/steps/0/text:
Pas #1:
Interactua amb una cuina per a 
obrir el menú de cuina.
eng.ui/tutorials/cooking/steps/1/text:
Pas #2:
Tria que vols cuinar
 a la part esquerra del menú.
eng.ui/tutorials/cooking/steps/2/text:
Pas #3:
Els ingredients, nivell de cuina, nivell
d'habilitat, i temps requerits són a la dreta.
eng.ui/tutorials/cooking/steps/4/text: Els plats cuinats són bons regals, i també recuperen resistència i HP si te'ls menges!
eng.ui/tutorials/cooking/steps/5/text: Pots comprar i descobrir noves receptes de moltes maneres.
eng.ui/tutorials/cooking/steps/6/text: Si desbloqueges avantatges d'habilitat, pots crear ítems infusionats amb atributs especials!
eng.ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/0/text:
Pas #1:Interactua amb una estació d'artesania per a 
obrir el menú d'artesania.
eng.ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/1/text:
Pas #2:
Tria que vols crear
 a la part esquerra del menú.
eng.ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/2/text:
Pas #3:
Els materials, nivell d'habilitat,
i temps requerits són a la dreta.
eng.ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/4/text: Pots comprar i descobrir noves receptes de moltes maneres.
eng.ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/5/text: Si desbloqueges avantatges d'habilitat, pots crear ítems infusionats amb atributs especials!
eng.ui/tutorials/dates/steps/0/text: Pots tenir Cites amb algú quan esculls el Camí del Romanç durant el seus Esdeveniment de 8 Cors!
eng.ui/tutorials/dates/steps/1/text: Pots Sortir amb múltiples persones alhora, però només te'n podràs casar amb una.
eng.ui/tutorials/dates/steps/2/text: Quan Surts amb algú, pots proposar-los-hi una Cita els dissabtes o als diumenges.
eng.ui/tutorials/dates/steps/3/text: Només pots anar de Cita amb cada persona un cop per setmana.
eng.ui/tutorials/dates/steps/4/text: Si Surts amb dues persones, pots fer Cita amb una el dissabte i amb l'altra el diumenge.
eng.ui/tutorials/dates/steps/5/text: Els Ítems d'Inspiració per a Cites desbloquejaran nous Tipus de Cites!
eng.ui/tutorials/dates/steps/6/text: Pots trobar Ítems d'Inspiració per a Cites fent diverses activitats. Fins i tot hi ha un venedor que en ven.
eng.ui/tutorials/dates/steps/7/text: Col·lecciona Postals quan vas a un Tipus de Cita amb algú per primer cop!
eng.ui/tutorials/dates/steps/8/text: Penja les Postals a casa teva per a mirar-te-les quan vulguis.
eng.ui/tutorials/dates/steps/9/text: En una actualització futura, quan puges el límit de cors, les Cites donaran mes Punts de Cor que els regals.
eng.ui/tutorials/dragons_breath_spell/steps/: The Alè Dracònic Spell can be used to project a destructive stream of fire for a short time.
It can also be used to open some previously inaccessible areas!
eng.ui/tutorials/elsie_gossip/steps/0/text: Un cop al dia, pots anar a l'Elsie i rebre Pistes pels Regals triant "Xafarderies".
eng.ui/tutorials/elsie_gossip/steps/1/text: Et donarà 3 persones, i si el regal és apreciat o adorat.
eng.ui/tutorials/elsie_gossip/steps/2/text: Escull una persona, i et revelarà un dels regals preferits seu!
eng.ui/tutorials/elsie_gossip/steps/3/text: Aquestes pistes estaran transparents a la llista de regals fins que en regalis un. (Com la Tulipaa, que és sòlida)
eng.ui/tutorials/elsie_gossip/title: Tutorial: les Xafarderies de l'Elsie (Pistes pels regals)
eng.ui/tutorials/farming/steps/0/text:
Pas #1:
Empra l'Aixada en un camp netejat i llauraràs el terra.
eng.ui/tutorials/farming/steps/1/text:
Pas #2:
Planta llavors a les caselles de terra llaurat.
eng.ui/tutorials/farming/steps/2/text:
Pas #3:
Rega els cultius diàriament fins que hagin crescut completament.
eng.ui/tutorials/farming/steps/4/text: Pots comprar una Pala al Supermercat quan vulguis expandre el teu camp.
eng.ui/tutorials/farming/steps/5/text:
Les collites les pots vendre,
cuinar, i fins i tot donar-les als teus animals!
eng.ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/0/text:
Ves buscant ombres a l'aigua;
són peixos..
eng.ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/1/text:
Empra la Canya de Pescar a prop
d'un peix; idealment, que
vegi l'esquer.
eng.ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/2/text:
Els peixos picaran l'ham.
Estiba ràpidament quan ho facin!
eng.ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/3/text:
De vegades trobaràs bancs de peixos.
Et permeten pescar múltiples
peixos, l'un darrere l'altre.
eng.ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/4/text:
També hi ha punts de buceig a l'aigua
Nada-hi i capbussa-t'hi
i trobaràs que s'hi amaga!
eng.ui/tutorials/lava_caves/steps/0/text: En aquesta àrea hi pots trobar bassals de lava.
eng.ui/tutorials/lava_caves/steps/1/text: Amb la Regadora o el Conjur de Pluja, les pots creuar!
eng.ui/tutorials/magic/steps/0/text:
Desbloquejaràs diversos Conjurs Màgics
durant el joc.
eng.ui/tutorials/magic/steps/1/text:
Un cop desbloquejats, els pots
triar i fixar-los via la pàgina de màgia
del teu diari.
eng.ui/tutorials/magic/steps/2/text:
Mantingues premut el botó
que s'indica al conjur fixat
i el llançaràs.
eng.ui/tutorials/magic/steps/3/text:
Cada conjur necessita una quantitat
de Manà diferent. Recuperes una mica
de Manà cada dia.
eng.ui/tutorials/magic/steps/4/text:
Si tens sort, trobaràs
pocions que recuperen el
Manà a l'instant!
eng.ui/tutorials/magic/steps/5/text:
Desbloquejaràs més orbs de Manà
durant el joc; incrementaran
el teu Manà màxim.
eng.ui/tutorials/milling/steps/0/text:
Pas #1:
Interactua amb una estació de moldre per a 
obrir el menú de moldre.
eng.ui/tutorials/milling/steps/1/text:
Pas #2:
Tria que vols moldre
a la part esquerra del menú.
eng.ui/tutorials/milling/steps/2/text:
Pas #3:
Els ingredients, i temps requerits són a la dreta.
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/0/text:
A la Mina hi pots trobar
nous materials, cultius silvestres, peixos,
cuques, i tresors!
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/1/text:
Pots trencar pedres a cada planta; en
una hi trobaràs una escala. Empra-la per 
a baixar a les plantes inferiors.
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/2/text:
Recorda que pots saltar i
nadar per a explorar més!
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/3/text:
Cada 5 plantes, desbloquejaràs
un pis del montacàrregues; així, podràs
anar i tornar a l'entrada ràpidament.
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/4/text:
Ves amb compte: la màgia del mon
ha tornat objectes inanimats
en monstres!
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/5/text: Ajuda't millorant la teva Espasai Armadura.
eng.ui/tutorials/mines/steps/6/text:
A l'estàtua de l'entrada pots comprar
avantatges de les habilitats de mineria
i de combat amb l'essència que recullis.
eng.ui/tutorials/mistmare/steps/0/text: A partir d'ara pots invocar Mistmare als exteriors!
eng.ui/tutorials/mistmare/steps/1/text: Invoca-la amb el nou botó que tens a la pantalla, i personalitza-la a la pestanya d'animals del teu diari.
eng.ui/tutorials/mistmare/steps/2/text: Pots comprar millores de la Mistmare a l'Estàtua del Cavall.
eng.ui/tutorials/museum/steps/0/text:
Pas #1:
Interactua amb el llibre del museuu per a 
obrir el menú del museu.
eng.ui/tutorials/museum/steps/1/text:
Pas #2:
Posa els ítems que vols donar
a la capsa de donacions i prem "Donar".
eng.ui/tutorials/museum/steps/2/text:
Se't mostrarà a quins sets pertanyen
les teves donacions, i quant et
queda per a completar-los.
eng.ui/tutorials/museum/steps/3/text:
Al llibre pots comprovar les ales del museu,
quant queda per completar i
pistes sobre les recompenses.
eng.ui/tutorials/museum/steps/4/text:
Llegeix els indicadors i veuràs
si un ítem pertany a cap set, i
si ja l'has donat o no!
eng.ui/tutorials/pets/steps/0/text: Pots canviar el nom, aparença, i cosmètics de la teva mascota quan vulguis via la pàgina indicada del teu diari.
eng.ui/tutorials/pets/steps/1/text: No cal que alimentis la teva mascota cada dia, però si ho fas (o l'amanyagues) augmentaràs el seu nivell de cor.
eng.ui/tutorials/pets/steps/2/text: A les mascotes les hi pots assignar diverses feines via la seva pàgina de diari. Et donaran els ítems demanats cada vespre.
eng.ui/tutorials/pets/steps/3/text: Però recorda que no es posaran a treballar els dies de pluja!
eng.ui/tutorials/ranching/steps/0/text:
Pots comprar cries d'animals a la
granja d'en Hayden després d'haver construït
un Estable o bé un Galliner on hi puguin viure.
eng.ui/tutorials/ranching/steps/1/text:
Els animals adults generaran productes.
Pots criar-los per desbloquejar nous
colors quan arribin a 2 cors!
eng.ui/tutorials/ranching/steps/2/text:
Assegura't d'alimentar i amanyagar als teus
animals a diari per a tenir-los
contents.
eng.ui/tutorials/ranching/steps/3/text:
Pots alimentar als animals de moltes maneres.
Amb la menjadora de dins, deixant-los pasturar,
o bé peixent-los de la mà!
eng.ui/tutorials/ranching/steps/4/text:
Pots treure als animals durant 
els dies de sol... Però no
ho facis quan fa mal temps.
eng.ui/tutorials/skill_perks/steps/0/text:
Recol·lecta essència fent activitats com ara
cultivar, pescar, minar, i moltes més!
eng.ui/tutorials/skill_perks/steps/1/text:
Interactua amb en Caldarus i
podràs veure el menú d'avantatges d'habilitats.
eng.ui/tutorials/skill_perks/steps/2/text: Tria una avantatge i en veuràs la descripció.
eng.ui/tutorials/skill_perks/steps/3/text:
Compra una avantatge d'habilitat pagant essència
i la desbloquejaràs!
eng.ui/tutorials/spring_festival/steps/0/tex:
Les Flors Alè de Primavera poden caure
com a ítem extra quan fas
diverses activitats.
eng.ui/tutorials/spring_festival/steps/1/tex:
Activitats com ara
cultivar, pescar, minar, i moltes més!
eng.ui/tutorials/spring_festival/steps/2/tex:
Cull-ne tantes com en puguis i porta-les
al Festival de Primavera del dia 17!
eng.ui/tutorials/spring_festival/steps/3/tex:
Com més en recol·lectis, tindràs millors
recompenses, decoracions, i inventari a la
paradeta del festival!
eng.ui/tutorials/teleportation_chalice/steps: Si vols teleportar-te ràpidament a casa, pots donar un xic d'Essència al Calze de Teleportació.
Quan ho facis, se't portarà instantàniament a davant de l'Estàtua d'en Caldarus de la teva granja!
eng.ui/tutorials/water_sprite_statue/steps/0: Posa una Estàtua d'Esperit d'Aigua als teus camps i la terra llaurada es regarà automàticament en un radi de 2 caselles.
eng.ui/tutorials/water_sprite_statue/steps/1: Per a que funcionin, cal carregar les Estàtues d'Esperit d'Aigua amb una Pedra d'Essència.
eng.ui/tutorials/water_sprite_statue/steps/2: Com més gran sigui la Pedra d'Essència, més dies romandrà carregada l'Estàtua.
eng.ui/tutorials/water_sprite_statue/steps/3: Pots crear Pedres d'Essència un cop desbloquegis la Refineria de Pedra.
eng.ui/tutorials/water_sprite_statue/steps/4: També pots trobar Pedres d'Essència en alguns cofres de la Mina!
